76a3(rgyud): bka' stsal pa la rjes su yi rangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo ces phyag 'tshal nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to rdzogs s+ho// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyin pos kyi
76a4(rgyud): 'dun dang bcas pa bdun la phyag 'tshal lo// dgra dang 'jigs pa kun las nal// rnam par gzigs ni gzi brjidra mi// rdzu 'phrul ngo bo gtsug tor te// thams cad skyob pa'i shes rab dang // lo ga dngasal
76a5(rgyud): stobs nyid dang // gser thub kyi ni bslab pa dang // 'od srung gi ni yon tan dang / shAkya bu pa'i brtson 'grus kyis// bdag ni rtag tu bde bang shog/ tad+ya thA/ dza san ti/ bi nga yan ti/ dza le bi nga yan de ti ti/ a ba rA
76a6(rgyud): dza~M ti/ ba rab tu pra ma du ni ya swA hA/ gzhan gyis mi rnab pa'i rig pa chen no// ngogs s+ho//  dus/ a rgyas rbA ma d+ha ya pra dAn d+hA ba d+hA ni pod gad du/ 'phags pa thams cad la mi 'jigs par sa
76a7(rgyud): smin pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+ha nas yul chu shing ar+tha
76a8(rgyud): gshegs te byon nas/ a mra'i tshal lus 'phags ri'i dbang po brag phug na bzhugs so// de na sa lha'i dbang po tu byin bcom ldan 'das gal pa dar song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
76b1(rgyud): mAn nas phyan 'tshal ta phyogs gcig tu 'dug no// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas lha'i dbang po'i ma byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di ma cas gsol te// bam ldan 'das rgya ma yin rnams ni rab tu gnos
76b2(rgyud): bcing bste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam yin na pas ma bdagal ldan ri por par rgol pas gral ga ldan/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la tsham btsun dugs la// de ska tsas gsal pa dpa bcom ldan
76b3(rgyud): kyis b+ha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad cas bka' stsal to// lha'i dbang ba khyod kyis thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i risha sngags don thams cad byed pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed ga nad
76b4(rgyud): rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ dug thams cad 'di lag mtshon thams cad rengs par byed pa/ rkang med dang / rkang gnyis dang / rkang pazhi pa thams cad rangs par byed pa/ dag pam pa cad phreng bar byed pa/ lha ma yin dang / 
76b5(rgyud): nam mkha' lding dang / sbyin byed ma'i bu dang / sha za dang / brjed byed dang / smyo byed dang / bram ze'i srin po dang / 'byung po dang / ra langs dang / bya'i gdon dang / srul po dang / nam gru dang / gzhon po'i gdon dang / brjed
76b6(rgyud): gdon dang / lha'i gdan dang / klu'i gdon dang / gnad srin gyi gdon dang / dri ba'i gdon dang / mi'am ci'i gdon dang / log dren gyi gdod dang / mamo'i gdon phung bar byed pa/ sadas 'gro ma dag zas
76b7(rgyud): za ba dang / zas su spos za ba dang / zas su me tog ze ba dang / zas su bdug pa za pa dang / zas su khrag 'thung ba dang / zas su nag 'thung ba dang / zas su mi gtsang ba za ba dang / zas su gcin 'thung bar
76b8(rgyud): bar byed pa/ rims nad thams cad dang / drung la 'gyur pa dang / 'khris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan la 'a gyur pa dang / 'dul pa las gyur pa dang / 'gro ba drag phul spyod pa rab tu 'jigs par byed pa/ 'bas
77a1(rgyud): cod bdud / 'thad pa dang / mtshang 'bru ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'adi zungs shig kham la ca mi mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa'i rig sngags pagad par bya'o// t+ya A/ a ma bram cu/ 
77a2(rgyud): tha dpa/ namam tham tshig ma 'a/  g+h+ra kA/ grA thAka r+dz+dza na mas rnam
77a3(rgyud): nA shA ni/ pra nA shA ni/ d+ha ba nI/ pra d+ha ba nI/ ba lag nI/ pra ba la nI/ mrid t+ya I/ pra nrid t+ya nI/ kro d+ha ni/ pra taM kro d+ha ni/ ha na ha na bi ha na bi ha na/ sarba duH pra duSh+Ta na nA sha la/ sa rba a b+ha la prA te/ bdag 'khor du
77a4(rgyud): pa 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gdon thams cad dang / nad 'ag pa thams cad las spang ba shig srungs shigag gnas 'dir bdag gi don thams cad grub par gyur cig 'di lta bas na// khrid khridi/ tsum b+he/ sa
77a5(rgyud): her te/ na maHsarba bud d+ha nA~M swA hA/ lha'i dbang po thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i rig sngags tshig bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa 'di skud pa mdud de bcings sam/ skal mdud pa por ram/ bzlas brjod
77a6(rgyud): yungs kar ram/ gi'u wang la lan gcig sngags de bskus sam/ go chal bsngags na mtshan gyis mi tshugs/ dug gi pa ma yin/ rims nad kyis ma yin/ nyin gcig pas ma yin/ nyin gnyis pas ma yin/ 
77a7(rgyud): nyid gsum pas ma yin/ nyin bzhi pas ma yin/ mis ma yin/ gsang sngags kyis ma yin/ ro langs kyis ma yin/ dug gis ma yin/ nad kyis ma yin te/ chus 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// 
77a8(rgyud): sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / spyod bsgrub pa thams cad spyong pa rnams kyis ma grub pa rnams grub par byed do// sbyar te grub pa rnam sa gzhan gyis mi chug sa par byed do// pha rol gyis bcings pa las
77b1(rgyud): byed do// na rdzan cod pa na do//  nan pa/ sngags 'tshal bar byad du// gdon mas cad phung bar byed do// 'don gang nam pa gta na yang de mdo dzad 'dog pa shin tu la ba
77b2(rgyud): na du 'gas so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin de nyid du mi ldang par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bu'i dbang po brgya byin yi rangs te/ bcom ldan dad sa bye sa gsungs pa la ma
77b3(rgyud): yang bstod do// 'phags pa thams cad la rab tu mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i gzung sajogs s+ho// / rgyag kyi mkhan ma na me tra dang / dAn shI la dang /  rkyen gyi mo ts+tsha badzin nam shes sdel bsgyur cing nus
77b4(rgyud): dag sar bcad kyis kyang bcom nas gtan la phabs// / rgya gar rmad du/ ud+yas gyiTI tsu ni rAm chur tri/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dbang bskur ba shes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub ngoms dpa'
77b5(rgyud): mas cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yo sha rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra bag dge slong ba rgya dgege 'dun chen po
77b6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' grabs med pa bye ba sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa na pas dang thalas gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thodadang ldan pa sha nga'i lal bka' stsal pa/ bA ri zla
77b7(rgyud): 'di stsas/ byang chub sems dpa'i sadang / byang chub 'ims dpa'i sngon kyad pa dang / bden pa'i na pam dang / bangs bsems dpa' yongs su bzung ga 'dra pa sems ca tshab 'di dag bcom na/ spyod cis
77b8(rgyud): di lta ste/ gzugs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzungs na yul nam gnas/ phyog sa na ma gan bcom ldan 'dam
78a1(rgyud): gzungs gzungs shes pa ba ldan 'das gnodo gang shanaso pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis medang ldan pa
78a2(rgyud): / ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu legs so legs so// shA ri'i bu khyod 'di ltar theg pa chen po la yang yang dag par zhugs pa dang / thag pa chen po la mngon par brtson pa dang / theg pa chen po la lhag par byed par
78a3(rgyud): gzungs yul na mi gnas/ phyogs na mi gnas par ston pa yang legs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu gzungs ni chos nyid kyis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba ma yin te/ shA ri
78a4(rgyud): ni'adas pa zhes mi 'chad/ ma 'ongs pa zhes mi 'chad/ da ltar byung ba zhes mi 'chad/ dngos por mi 'chad/ dngos po med par mi 'chad/ mtshan ma dang / mtshan ma med par mi 'chad/ chos gang skye
78a5(rgyud): ba'i phyir ram/ 'gag pa'i phyir mi 'chad mod kyi// shA ri'i bu 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' la phan par bzhed pa'i phyir ston te/ gang 'di gzungs kyi chos kyi nam grangs kyi gzungs
78a6(rgyud): gzugs med par bya ba'i lan du gyur pa/ rigs pa'i stobs kyis gnas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan/ sangs rgyas kyi lhag par bya ba bsgrub pa/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims/ sangs rgyas/ 
78a7(rgyud): kyi bsdus pa/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshams sbyor ba/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba'o// de de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzungs gang la
78a8(rgyud): gnas shing gzung sa dathos na byang chub sems dpa' blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang / dam bca' ba bzung ba dang / chos la mi gnas pa dang / bad
78b1(rgyud): tshom ma mchis pa dang / slob dpa nam mams pa dang / rang she la ma la gnas pa bcom ldan 'das bshad du gsal/ bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gas la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
78b2(rgyud): le'u legs so legs so// shA ri'i zu gzungs thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas nyid du brjodado// 'di'i bu gang la la zhig byang chub sems dpa' gzungs thong pa la bcwa stang du byed
78b3(rgyud): ma/ bla mar byed dam/ rim gror byed dam/ mtshad na des sangs rgyas thams cad la bsti stang byas par 'gyur ro// dang dag gis gzungs 'di thos pa dang / gang dag mos pa de dag kyang sangs rgyas rnams ji lta
78b4(rgyud): sbyin du mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyung shing byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// shA ra'i bug rdzas ni 'di yin te/ mabAR+Sha nI/ un d+hu Ni/ sam pra tiSh+Thata/ sa tam/ swa pra ti/ Sh+Tha tA/ 'dzi la bAl/ 
78b5(rgyud): tedzA a ro hA dz+nyA na pa te/ ud pa da nI/ bI nA ma NI/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa ni/ a b+hi b+h+ya drA dra/ shu b+ha ba ti/ a ni shI ti/ bahu kum+b+ha b+ha/ oM b+hi ba tsa shA ri'i bu 'di dag ni dbang skur ba shes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi mingan
78b6(rgyud): / 'das pa rnams dang / ma 'ongs pa rnams dang / da ltar byung ba rnams dang / legs par gnas pa rnams byang chub sems dpa' gang gis legs par bzung ste 'chang ba de myur du mngon par rdzogs par
78b7(rgyud): 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir bskal pa brgya dang / bskal pa stang dag smon lam gyis zad par byed par 'gyur/ de la mtshon gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur/ me dang srog chags mi srun pa rnams kyis mi tshugs
78b8(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shA ri'i bu gzungs 'di ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum mo// shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu lo gang la las stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i grangs me
79a1(rgyud): / bcu ma thar chags su gang pa'i sangs rgyas rnams lan par 'dang / gal mas pa 'angabs bskas bgrangs med pa gzung 'byas pa pas/ rigs kyi thal// rigs kyi bu ma gnan
79a2(rgyud): gang gis gzungs 'di las tha na tshig gcig tsam gzung bde bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu dbang bskur ba'i dazungs 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi lum yin pa'i phyir ro// 
79a3(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / me dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
79a4(rgyud): nagasungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dbang bsrung ba zhes bya ba'i gzus rdzogs kyi// cag ni mkhan po dzin me dza dang / dAn shil dang / bu chen gyil rtsu ba ban+de ye shes smras
79a5(rgyud): bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar ba cad kyis kyang btsal nas gtan la phab pa// / rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya tsak+Shur bi sho d+ha ni nA ma bi d+yaman/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mig rnam par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i
79a6(rgyud): sngags/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya'i grong rdal bzang bshig na shAH rnams kyi nang na
79a7(rgyud): babugs te/ de'i tshe sta tu sa zhes bya ba na shAkya bde ba zhes bya ba sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa/ chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa/ sangs rgyas la skyabs su song / chos la skyabs sra sod/ dge'ang
79a8(rgyud): rgyabs sus // sangs rgyas la gcig tu phyogs tsham la gcigs stsogs dag 'dun pa gcig phyogs yangs rgyas la nam nu med mchom me/ tshas dag dag 'dun dang sdug bsngal ba dang // 
79b1(rgyud): kun 'byung ba dang / 'gag pa dang lanam nung mad cang mtsham mdal ban pa mthong ba/ 'bras bu bag/ mngon par rtogs par 'grang ba mtshan cha dang / dbyig pa zar bzhin gnas pa de'i mig la
79b2(rgyud): dang / mi snang ba'i gzugs rnams snang bar 'gyur nas/ de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la dad pa skyes te yid la byed cing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
79b3(rgyud): dzad pa/ sgron ma 'dzin pa gsal ba 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bde bar gshegs pa thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ gsal bar mdzad du gsal/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi mig rnam par sbyang dugs
79b4(rgyud): sa byas pa dang / bcom ldan 'das lnga'i gnas pa la 'bugs pa/ lha'i sgra rnam par dag pa mi lus 'das pas sakya bdebs cig de skad brjod pagasan te// gsan nas kyang ting 'dzin demasas
79b5(rgyud): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod song la mig rnam par skyong ba'i rig sngags 'dis shAkya bde ba la bsrung ba kyis shig/ yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang
79b6(rgyud): yongs su bsrung ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon tshe spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug pa sad pa dang / mtshams bcad pa dang / sa bcing ba kyis shig/ de dang de ba
79b7(rgyud): du 'khor bzhi po dge slong rnams dang / dge slong ma rnams dang // she sbyin rnams dang / dge ba snyen ma rnams dang / sems can gzhan gyi mig kyang rnam par sbyongs shig/ mig gi klubs rnam par skyongs ga/ 
79b8(rgyud): med pa kyis shig/  ma mi gan mthon tamam tshus mal ma ngas sa mas ma ko pa // kunapa 'jos / kyim momananapa
80a1(rgyud): 'din mig gi byon dang / rlung gi skyon dang / mkhris pa'i skyon dang / bad kan gyi skyon dang / 'dul pa las gyur ba'i ston pa la te/ chu ma khrims kyi bden pa dang / btul zhug pa kyi 'den
80a2(rgyud): ba dang / drang srong rnams kyi bden pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i bden pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi bden pa dang / sun 'byung gi bden pa dang / 'gog pa'i bden pa dang / lam gyi bden pa dang / dgra
80a3(rgyud): bcom pa rnams kyi bden pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi bden pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bden pas shAkya bde ba'i mig na bar ma gyur cig/ mchi ma 'dzag par ma gyur cig/ kun du
80a4(rgyud): ches 'jug par ma gyur cig// bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi mig rnam par dga' gyur cigs hA/ kun dga' 'a rig ljags kyi rgya la mchig rnam par myong ba 'di ni yang dag par
80a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas drug gis gsungs pa'o// nga yang da ltar 'chad de/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha rnams kyi bdag po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa yang rjes su yi rang ngo // sun dga' bog
80a6(rgyud): she sngags 'di dus gsum du brjod na de la thibs par 'gyur ba 'am/ rab rib ba ma/ ling tog gam/ mi gnad sngon por mthong ba'am/ mig gi yul gyi skyon lha las gyur pa rnams sam/ sku lasathu ba
80a7(rgyud): mas sam/ dri za las gyur pa rnams sam/ gnod sbyin las gyur ba rnams lam/ srin po las gyur pa rnams sam/ sha za las gyur pa rnams sam/ byad las gyur pa rnams lam/ ro langs la'agyu
80a8(rgyud): mas sam/ ro langs dang byad las gyur ba rnams sam/ kun tu rgya las rtsu pa rnams lal/ dun tu chu dang ro sangs lasagyur pa rnams kyis tshugs par 'gyur ba ni lnga dang bams pa dang / bdud dang bcas/ 
80b1(rgyud): rgyangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram par bcas pa dang / lha dang / ye dang / g+ha ma yin du bcas pa'i skye gu'i 'jig rten nangs ma mthong ste de ni gnas med do// tshe dang ldan pa kun dka' ba
80b2(rgyud): com ldan 'das kyi lhar mnyan te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin na zhes gsol nas/ gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams gzung ste/ kun chub par byas nas shAkyang depag pa ba der mangs/ 
80b3(rgyud): mig rnam par skyeng ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pas khyod la bskur gyis nyin re zhing dus gsum du dran par gyis shig ces de la rgyas par smras so// shAkya de bas thos ma
80b4(rgyud): zag le nar mig rnam par dag stemag rnam par dag pas drim med pa'i mig gi sa thams cad ma thong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyi di srid ces bag stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' ba dang / shAkya bde ba dang / 
80b5(rgyud): lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa mig rnam par skyong nga zhes bya ba'i rin sngags rdzogs s+ho// / rgya ga ska dad/ A
80b6(rgyud): an ta nA li bi sho d+ha ni nA ma d+hA da n+ti/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa yang du gcod pa thams cad rnam par sbyang ba zhes bya ba'i gsungs/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal ni/ tshal la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag
80b7(rgyud): lo// 'di skad ba dgag/ sa thas pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po la kyi shar phyogs bram ze'i gling shing amra'i gnas shes bya ba de'i byang phyogs na lus 'phags ri ma dbang pa'i grags
80b8(rgyud): bzhugasas// de nas lha'i dang badzi sbyin 'amamam bar che 'gyu te/ do'i cher du byed kyi thun me lus pa'i snga ltas ying du chud nas sdug 'askyes te/ btsun mtsho pong dang / gatsha dang brtse pa
81a1(rgyud): / ldan 'das kyasan dus nas/ banam ldan las rgyan 'as la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskong ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/ yang de'i tshe don du gnyer
81a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de'i phyir khyod kyis rig pa'i gsang sngags gzhi gang dag gis bdud thams cad dang / phyir rgol ba thams cad dang / bas kyi rgol ba thams cad
81a3(rgyud): / tu tshar gcod par 'gyur 'bar du gcod pa thams cad rnam par sbyang ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i gseng sngags gzhi 'di rnams nyon cig/ ta thA/ a b+ha yI g+ha ya bi ga prA b+ha ya byA re sho d+ha ne/ a b+ha yi a
81a4(rgyud): dade/ ni du ma/ an bu le/ oM kul ba rI sho d+ha ne/ a theg me an+d+ra ti/ shuh+ye shuH/ ting ting ba te/ sha ni u pa sha me/ mnyang sham/ mi bri me d+h+yad d+hitat+ta shai/ to sha ya ces te/ saut+ya
81a5(rgyud): a bi ru d+he/ sa ha te/ si hi tatwe/ arbe Ar+tha sid d+hi/ a mr-i te/ a mri ta Sha te/ ap+si te/ badz+ra sa t+ye ak+Sha ye/ ak+Sha la pra b+he/ dran tra re/ shud d+he shud d+he pra b+he/ a ba b+ha se/ aM baSh+Ta sa pa ti/ u ba yog/ 
81a6(rgyud): ta pe/ s+yAm nI// byad byas d+hiSh+Thane/ shI li'i shai d+hAn/ a sa da t+t+ra / srin kr-iSh+mi/ ta ma mar bA wAnA ma/ pa ma/ kaHn+d+he/  mnanamo la k+ta / yun ma/ d+har+m+ma ni d+han s+ya kra
81a7(rgyud): sham+ba/ kau sha ke khyod kyis rig pa'i gas sngags gni 'di dag dang khyod kyis rig pa'i gsang sngags gzhi gang dag gis bdud thams cad dang / byed rgol pa thams cad dang / las kyi rgol pa thams
81a8(rgyud): ra can su sa dag// di bras bad byasan rjed kyilas kyin ma par smin ma gtogs par ba drug pa thams cad nam pa dag par 'gyung/ den 'ams cad kyang grub pa
81b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis de na cos bka' stsal ba dang / lha'i dbang po ldan byen yi rangs te/ de'i tshe 'di skad du/ a bo lha las mgyural// de nyid na ni 'dug bzhin du// kho bos che yang blo tshan gyis// srog
81b2(rgyud): dasar shes par gyis/  su 'a du 'ad //  sems can gyis bdagag par dug tsud pa dang / bzhigs dag yos rten mas kyi ni med par bya phyika/ kun dumatshigs / 
81b3(rgyud): mas cad ni grub par gyur cig/ ni ma~M i he t+ya le na ga can na ye swA hA/ sapa sarba sA d+ha ni ye swAH/ d+harmA sAng+ga ni ya swA hA/ sarba dar ye'i shod+ha ni yai swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
81b4(rgyud): mas kyid nga bo byin btsun mi'i la ba dang bcas shing la da rgya pa/ sems da ldan pa de na yings te/ bcom ldan rnaMm gyis ga dres pa la mngon pa byed do// 'phags sa
81b5(rgyud): bar du gcod pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// rgyag kyi mkhan po/ dzi na mi tra dang / dz+nyA na kI la dang / zhu chen gyi ts+tshab ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing mus te gtan la phab
81b6(rgyud): kar skad du/ ar+ya sarba san ta ra sog+na sat+kA ra NA man tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa par du gnod pa thams cad pa li ming gzungs sdugs/ mchis rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sems cad la phag
81b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phye na rdorje la bka' stsal pa/ phyagan rdorje 'dungs sngags 'di sa 'dzin pa dra/ 'chang ba dang / bzlas brgyad byed pa ma
81b8(rgyud): kyis 'chi ba dang / ltogs pa dang / mtshon brgyab pa dang / gcan gzan ma du nges pas za ba dang / ma mtshig pa dang / chur 'i chi ba dang / 'go ba'i rims gzhan yang 'dang / mdze nad dang / 
82a1(rgyud): / mi rung ba'i nad pang ba dang / galang lhung bdang / gzhan gyi byad dang / ngas kyi pa dngas pa dang / bdag rang gis gsod pa dang / de mya ngag shi ngan du che ba bcu gsum gyis rkyen byed par

87b3(rgyud): bang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun du rgyal ba 'od srung gi rigs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od mdza' yas
87b4(rgyud): rkyal ba 'od srung gi rigs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'chi med 'od chen po rgyal ba 'od srung gi rigs dang bcas pa la bya
87b5(rgyud): 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od chen po rgyal ba 'od srung gi rigs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
87b6(rgyud): rgyas 'od chen rgyal ba 'od srung gi rigs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od mnyam pa med pa rgyal ba 'od srung gi rigs dang
87b7(rgyud): pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa rgyal ba 'od srung gi rigs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan
87b8(rgyud): 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas drang srong chen po 'od srung gi rigs dang bcas pa bdun pa dadag la phyag 'tshal lo// zhi ba'i dbyings su chags pa 'khor dang bcas pa

112a6(rgyud): 'bar ba me lce gcig tu gyur pas de'i mgo tshal ba bdun du 'gems so// lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang rdo rje 'ben te// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje yang rdo rje 'bar ba/ rab tu
112a7(rgyud): ba/ kun d+ha rab tu mched cing 'bar ba me lce gcig tu gyur pas de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gems so// de rgyal ba'i pho brang ljang lo can du gnas su mi dbang ste/ de'i mgo A
112a8(rgyud): rten du tshal ba bdun du 'gas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten
112b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa gzungs chen po rdzogs so// // rgya ga gyi mkhan por ne mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / khru chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes
112b2(rgyud): sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bac+doMs nas gtan la phab pa// @#// rgya yar skad du/ Ad+ya a tsa la nA mA d+ha rA NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mi ga yo ba zhes bya ba
112b3(rgyud): zungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus bcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum gyi khang bu rtsegs pa na bzugs te/ de'i tshe bcom lda
112b4(rgyud): 'das kyis 'khor 'dul la ni byang chub sems dpar kun tu bzang po dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / sa'i snying po dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / 'jam dpal dang / spyan ras
112b5(rgyud): rigs dbang phyug dang/ lag na rdo rje dang / byams pa pa sogs pa sa bcu pa 'ba' zhigadang ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa stan lngas langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig
112b6(rgyud): nas pus mog le swa pa'i lhar sal btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / 
112b7(rgyud): ngas pa dag gis mi nad dang / phyugs nang dang / yams dang / rnam par 'tshe ba dang / dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba dang / sdang ba
112b8(rgyud): g.yol pa la sogs pa phyung ste/ de dag zhi bar mdzad du gsol zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar rnam par dag pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par
113a1(rgyud): // sku'i pa spu'i khung bu nas 'od zer me lce rab tu 'bar ba phyung ste/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa la thug pa me lce 'brar ba gcig tu gyur to// dri'i tshe nyi ma
113a2(rgyud): zla ba la sogs pa'i 'od kyang lham me dang / wAn+da ne dang / ltung dri ma yin te/ lha rnams kyi 'od kyang lha pra mA dang / ldan na dang / lgang nga ma yin no// klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / 
113a3(rgyud): sogs pa rnams ni rang dan pos bangs pa'i shing bzhin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ches ste dbyings rnamAM par mi u~M zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa mi nyam par
113a4(rgyud): mnyam pa'i phyag rgya ba shig nas zhabs kyi pus mo sal brdabs pas thugs kyis bdag nyid kyi brtan pa'i sku can gyi khro bo zhabs brkyang bskum du bzhugs pa dag
113a5(rgyud): thabs las byung ba'i khro ba'i sprul pa dpag tu med pa dang bcas nas nam mkha' ma lus pa 'od kyis 'gengs pa'o// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dag na bzhugs pa tshangs pa dang / 
113a6(rgyud): 'jug drang dbang phyug chen po dang / drag po chen po bzhi po dag ha hUM hrIHzhes bya bas skrag par byed pa/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang drang / gti mug dang / ser sna dag 'joms pa/ 
113a7(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang / sha za yi dgas la sogs pa hUM maM zhes brjod pas skrag par mdzad pa dag sprul to// gsungs gi bdag nyid kyi brtan pa'i sku can thibs phyed sal du
113a8(rgyud): nga mthe bo bcugs pa/ zhabs gcig langs te pus mo btsugs pas bzhugs pa'i khro ba brtan pa'i sku can/ shes rab kyi bdag nyid rol gri me 'ong dang bcas
113b1(rgyud): 'od kyis 'gengs pa dag sprul to// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlabs pa las byung bI khro bo dag gi sngags smras pa/ na maHsa man ta badz+rA NAM/ a tsA pA ka na
113b2(rgyud): Ta ma hA ro sha Na s+pho Ta ya hU~M ba dz+re d+hi ka kha ra ba/ hUM maM hUM maM zhes brjod de/ phyag rgya ni lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur ru bcangs te/ sbyin lag dang mthe'u chung gnyis bsgreng pa ne ral gri'i phyag rgya
113b3(rgyud): g.yas bskor du mtshams btsud do// na maHsam+ban ta badz+ra r+tha/ a tsa la ka na tsaN Ta ma hA ro sha Na/ s+pho Ta ya hUM/ a mr-i ha hUM hUM zhes brjod do// phyag rgya ni lag pa sdor mo rnams brkyang ste
113b4(rgyud): mthe'u chung mthe bos mnan pa ni rdo rje rje gsum pa'i phyag ste/ g.ya stan sa bskor la bgegs bskrad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bsrung ba
113b5(rgyud): gsungs pa ni dmar po'i yi ge raM spyi bor bsam ste/ rnam par dag pa'i yi ge 'di bstan par byas nas rdo rje dang ral gris lus me 'od dang bcas par bsgoms te/ na maHsa man ta
113b6(rgyud): a tsa la ka na ra NaT ma hA boHd+hu ka~M te b+h+ya/ sarba bi ga ta b+h+yo/ bi sh+yA mu khe b+h+yaHsAn ta thA ga tA ha maM/ rak+ta nAs brjod de phyag rgya ni rdo rje thul mo sbyar te/ mdzub mo gnyis phung mo'i rgyab tu sbyar
113b7(rgyud): smin mtshams su bca' bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi sems rig pa chen po'i bsrung ba gsungs pa ni hU~M dang gzhi'i rnam pas bltas te/ nA maHsa man ta ba
113b8(rgyud): in lagan can rngam pon te b+h+yaHsa miganye b+h+yo/ bi sa mug b+h+yo/ sas ta thAg tata maM/ rak+Sha ma dA ba 'o// sas thug tu braman rigadudu sa sum tu tha arba tiha nye pAd+ma/ zhes ra
114a1(rgyud): // phyag rgya nI rnga'i thal ma sbyar la mdzub mo gnyis nang du bkug la phung moHsrad de/ srin lag gnyis babyung nas mthe'u chung gnyis cung zhig bkug pa snying gad barba
114a2(rgyud): bsrung ba ni yum gyi sa/ bgegs dang log 'dren dang ma rungs pa thams cad dran pa tsam gyis 'byer bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la
114a3(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs te/ kha zas bye brag bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / gzhibs pa dang / bting ba dang / bltag pa pa sogs pa dang / gzugs dang / s+tha dang / dri dang / ro
114a4(rgyud): thag la byin gyis brlab pa mdzad de/ oM sarba d+harma ta sita trUM zhes byas pas dka par byas te/ oM a mr-i ta A~M Sh+T+r-iH zhes bya bas ni 'dod pa'i don du'o// yon maHsa rbA tAH
114a5(rgyud): a ba la ki ti/ suM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra hUM zhes bya bas lan bdun btab ste bsngos pas tshim par 'gyur ro// phyagan+d+ha ni mchog sbyin gyi phyag cu'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes
114a6(rgyud): pu/ ldang bar 'dod na sngags 'di brjod pAr bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya~M/ na me ts+tshanAT+Ta badz+ra pAr+Naye/ nam badz+ra krod+d+hi yA/ da~MSh+Tod kaMNi b+he rA wa~M y+ya/ a simras la' shu shAHswA
114a7(rgyud): oM a shre ta kurba Ta li/ khe kha khA hi khA hi/ ti/ tit+ta/ ban d+ha binid+ha/ ha na ha na/ gr-ih+Na pr-it+ta/ brdza gadz+ra/ bi s+phoT ya/ bi s+pho Da ya/ sarba hrI
114a8(rgyud): swAsAhA/ zhes bya ba brjod do// lag pa gnyis khu chur bcangs la kha nang du bstan te/ mdzub mo baspeng la drang du bsnol la phyag rgya bcings te/ 
114b1(rgyud): de bzhinom/ nye reg bya ba dang / khrus bya ba na rin po che'i bum par dri rim po'i rdul/ na maHsa man+ta ta badz+rA NAM/ a tsa la kan ya a mr-i ta zhes pan bdun bdun 'dab ste/ lag pa gaH
114b2(rgyud): pas bum pa bzung nas g.yas pa'i gung po dang srin lag cung zad tsam bkug la/ ri mo can gyi nang du aM bsams la chu blugs te/ oM shud d+ha dun te sho d+ha na me swAr+tha zhes bya bas
114b3(rgyud): khrus bya'o// de skad ces bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la'o// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa dang / sum cu rtse gsum gyi lha dang
114b4(rgyud): 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis me tog dang / rnga dang / bdug spos dang / lnga'i zhal zas dang / lha'i bu pho dang / bu mo dag rin
114b5(rgyud): che'i rkyen dang bcas pas shing ta dpag tu med pa dang / mchod pa'i yo byad dpag tu med pa dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang bskor ba rgya chen po dag byas te byang chub sa
114b6(rgyud): dpa' byams pa dang thabs gcig tu 'dug to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa sgob dang ldan pas ma ldan 'das la bas ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis byams pa'i brisam pa
114b7(rgyud): mkhyen nas bsam gtan dang po la mnyam par bzhag ste/ 'dod pa'i bde ba spangs te dga' bar rtog pa tsam mo// de nas bsam gtan dang po nas gnyis pa la mnyam par bzhag ste/ rtseg
114b8(rgyud): nga'i tog spyod spangs te dga' bde tsam mo// bsam gtan gnyis pa nas gsum pa la mnyam par bzhag ste/ tog pa dang spyod pa spangs te bde ba tsam mo// de nas bsam gtan gsum pa nas pa
115a1(rgyud): pa la mnyam par bzhag ste/ tshor banye ba zhi ba'i badre ba tsam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal gA/ ting nge 'dzin de dag dang ldan na rnam par dag pa'o// byams pa/ 
115a2(rgyud): dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyis ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyud spel ba'o// de bzhin du chos thams cad ni nam mkha' la ba mtha' bani las rnam par grol ba'o// ma
115a3(rgyud): pa man ta badz+rA d+haM/ d+harma d+hA tu swa b+ha ba at+ma ko&haM/ zhes brjod de phyag rgya ni 'di'o// lag pa gnyis so sor bur tshur bcangs te/ mthe bong gnyis nang du bcu ga la mdzub mo gnyis bsnyeng
115a4(rgyud): / 'phags pa mo g.yo ba'i gzungs las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje'i skyil mo dkrung bcas te snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'drar la
115a5(rgyud): gas kyi sa bon 'od kyis nam mkha' kun khengs par bsams te/ sa bon de las chos thams cad tshig gi lam dang bral ba'o zhes bya ba'i sgra dang bcas pas 'phel ba dang
115a6(rgyud): 'od zer 'phro 'du dang bcas pa'o// de nas sna tshogs pa'i gang na 'dam nas skyes pa'i dri ma med cing yongs su rgyas pa tshogs kyi bdag po'i steng du rta bdun pa kun nas 'ong
115a7(rgyud): skyes dang ldan pa dag gi steng du nam mkha'i mdog can gyi thugs kyi sa bon dang bdag nyid gcig pa'i nam mkha'i khams kun tu khyab par 'od kyis 'gengs pa'i shes rab kyi
115a8(rgyud): po dag tu gyur te/ de dag la sa bdud dang ma rungs pa mtha' dag 'joms pa'i khro bo chen po na ma tog thams cad yongs su bcom pa dri ma med cing gzhon nu'i sku'o// de yang gzhor
115b1(rgyud): sha d+has pa ni dper na bus pa gzhon nu lang tshol bab pa'i rul lnga bu snye 'i khru mdog ni mthing nag tu gnas me/ dpe na dbya kyi mas sprin nag po'i mngon bzhin du gnas pa'o// rnam pa
115b2(rgyud): ma lus pa thams cad du 'od kyis 'gengs pa ni dper na rta bdun pa'i 'od kyis gling kun tu khyab pa bzhin no// dbu skra gcig tu bcings shing 'phyar ba ni dper na shIng a la ka'i 'bras bu
115b3(rgyud): bzhin no// sku cung zhig 'agling ba dang g.yo ba ni dper na drapag bsam gyi shing yongs 'dus brtol bzhin no// zhabs brkyang bskum du bzhugs pA ni dper na gyad kyi 'gros bzhin no// 
115b4(rgyud): kaglum shin tu dmar pa ni dra p+te na pa la sha'i me tog bzhin no// spyan steng 'og tu blta ba ni steng 'og gi bgegs pasreg pa ste/ dpe rA na lha ma yin gyi bya gtor ma za ba bzhin no// mche ba gachags
115b5(rgyud): bA ni da pe na zla ba phyed pa bzhin no// ljags shin tu 'khyug pa ni dper na nam mkha'i glog bzhin no// smin ma khro gnyer du bsdus pa ni dper nA shing pag kA'i lo ma bzhin no// phyag ga
115b6(rgyud): bsdams pa ni dper na gza' chen po'i 'od srung ba bzhin no// sbal gyi zhags pa g.yon na bsnams pa ni dper na rgya mtsho mjing bzhin no// de lta bu'i sku des ni tshangs pa dang / 
115b7(rgyud): du/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag dang / phyogs skyong ba la sog sde ba rnams dbang du bsrud pa/ lha dang klu ma rungs pa dang / srin po dang sha za dang / grul bum dang / lto 'phyelas
115b8(rgyud): ngoms par byed pa dag go// de'i sngags bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs la nam ma man te 'ang gle sa mam nyamang po na po das/ grom dzin tum la byam ma smra
116a1(rgyud): 'dod par bya'o// de ci 'tsha ba dang / rnam par 'argyu ba dang / snang ba dang / rnam par snang ba dang / log 'dren dang / rnam par log 'dren dang / srin po dang / gang gzung / 
116a2(rgyud): rnaladz+ra dang / sha ba lams pa thams cad par 'gyur ro// d+hU lus byu pa da / mchis pa las snang bdang / bdakan las gyur pa dag 'bras dang / thub dang/ 
116a3(rgyud): mdze dang / 'brum bu dang / 'brum bu phra mo dang / rims nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / zla ba phyed pa dang / sdang dub pa dang / yud tsam pa'i rims dang / rta
116a4(rgyud): rims las thar bar 'gyur ro// seng ge dang / stag dang / dom dang / dred dang / spyang nyi dang / sbrul drug can dang / sbrang bu dang / sha spang dang / bud pa'i gnod pa las tha
116a5(rgyud): rgyal po'i chad pa dang / dmag dpung gi 'degs pa la sa ra ro// rkun po dang / bran dang / gzi'i mi 'thub cing rtsod pa las thar ro// chu yi 'jigs pa dang / me yi 'jigs
116a6(rgyud): bdang / swA yos pa'i 'jigs pa dag/ lce 'bab pa'i 'jigs pa las thar ro// ral zi dang / shag ti dang / dgra s+thA dang / mdung dang / mda' dang / mda' boche dang / 'a
116a7(rgyud): tshor cha'i 'jigs pa las thar ro// 'chi ba dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba las thar ro// mtshams med lnga la sogs pa'i srig pa kun 'dag par 'gyur ro// sems can dmya
116a8(rgyud): yi dgas dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / yul mtha' 'kho ba dang / dbang po ma tshang ba dang / lha tshe ring po dang / log par lta ba'ang na pa dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba la mnyes pa med pa
116b1(rgyud): mi 'thur ro// bzungs sngags 'di ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs te/ lan cin brjod pas kyang sdin pa thams cad 'dadra par 'gyur ro// 'di brjod pa'i ga
116b2(rgyud): des ni chos nyid kyilam rdo rje lta bu myur ba nyid du thob par 'gyur ro// de nas te 'dun pa'i steng du rnam par dag pa'i yi ge nam mkha' ma lus pa 'od kyis 'gangs pa bsams te/ byams pa
116b3(rgyud): lta bas lta ba'i phyir hI ser po mig du'o// srog gi lam du ni maM nag po bsam par bya'o// spyi bong chos nyid rnam par dag pa'i yige bsams te/ sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// nam
116b4(rgyud): bAn ta badz+ra pA NI/ tsan Ta ma hA ro Na hUM zhes brjod de lag pa thal mo sbyar te/ phung mo ba steng pa'i gyu mdzub mo cung ra bkug phrin lag kyang de bzhin du byas te/ rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// 'dri'i byin gyi brda
116b5(rgyud): se ma rig pa 'joms shing ye shes kyi sku nyid du byin gyis brlab pa'o// gaper khA sogs pa'i snod du kha nas kyi bye brag nas dang / 'bras dang / 
116b6(rgyud): dang / 'o ma dang / sbrang rtsi dang / khar dang / ga ser dang / dngul dang / zangs dang / mu tig dang / byi ru dag blugs te/ 'bru nasum pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs nas sngag sa 'di pa
116b7(rgyud): par bya'o// na maHsams tata thA ga te b+h+ya/ bi shra ma khe b+h+ya/ sarba tad khaM udag te/ swa raN hi mi gag ma bzhes brjod par bya'o// phyag rgya ni mchog sbyin
116b8(rgyud): bal ga te/ os bAr se b+har d+hu zhes bya bas 'byung ba kun la mchod par bya'o// de nas gsang sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// namathas man ta bud drin/ cin tha ma nga so ma mal ma rnyes
117a1(rgyud): // hA sa ma ya/ sarba pA paM swA s+tha phyag rgya thal mo smrapa pa gsol ba gang ba steng mchig gsoba'o// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i gzungs la ba le'u gnyis pa'o// / de nas
117a2(rgyud): ni 'di yin te/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun ni 'bras bu dang / lam dang / sgrub pa'i khyad par te/ gang nas brtsams te byed par gyis mchod cing nam du yang mi 'bral bar bya
117a3(rgyud): tshad med pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyud rtag tu sgom zhing smon lam rgya chen po gdab par bya'o// sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / sngags dang phyag rgya'i rten nun du bcangs shing bral bar
117a4(rgyud): lha dang / bla ma dang / byang chub kyi grogs la khong nas 'khrug pa'i sems spang ngo // grog gis bsdus pa'i sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / snying rje sngon du song bsag
117a5(rgyud): rnam par 'tsha ba spangs te nam yang dor ba mi bya'o// ser sna sbyangs te sems can la sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o// sems can la gnod pa dang / rnam par 'tshe ba spang
117a6(rgyud): tshul khrims bsten pa'o// rang pa rnam par 'tshe ba la brjod par bya'o// rang dang gzhan gyi don po sgrub po la brtson pa dor ba mi bya'o// rnam par g.yeng ba spangs te bsamag
117a7(rgyud): panyam par bzhag go/ nyal ba dang ldang ba kun tu rang bzhin gyis rnam par dgra pa'i don la ma yongs par bya'o// dam tshig med cing mi gnas pa lnga bsam gtan dang / 
117a8(rgyud): 'dzin dang / sngags dang / phyag rgya la sogs pa kun bstan cing bshad par mi bya'o// srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa la phyin ci log pa dang
117b1(rgyud): ni tshangs par spyod pa dang / spyad par 'dod pas snang bar bya'o// dge slong rnams dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / rA ma tshig dang ldan pa lags par bya zhing brnyas pa
117b2(rgyud): bya'o// thun 'tshamos kyi sbyor ba dang ldan par bya'o// khro ba dang / bab chol du smra ba dang / lung lung dang / bshang gci 'dor ba dang / dri ma 'khru ba dang / skra dang sen ma la sogs bla'i
117b3(rgyud): bde dag dang / dring ba dang / dri ma mi zhim pa dgu zhing mnam pa dang ldan pa thams cad spang bar bya'o// khang pa ni spos kyi khang pa ying du 'odra ba gtsang zhing dri ma med pa dgA bkra shis
117b4(rgyud): shar du bstan pa/ gser skar dang bcas pa'i khang pa 'am/ bram ze'i khyim mam/ dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba 'am/ lha khang+ga dam/ ri ba'i rtsa'am/ bya skad sgrogs pa'i sa 'am/ 
117b5(rgyud): 'am/ bas mtha' 'am/ spang ldangs dag tu dri zhim po'i chus bkyang nul byas la/ rtswa'i stan bting ste gnas par bya'o// khri la 'dug pa spang bar bya'o// dang 'o ma dang / mar dang / 
117b6(rgyud): dang / lag ban dang / snum 'bur dang / 'brer s+ya dang / 'bras dang / 'bras can la so// sde pa dgra spang ba dang ldan pas bza' bar bya'o// sha dang / chang dang / sgeg pa la sogs par
117b7(rgyud): ba'i zas rnams kun tu spang bar bya'o// zla ba dang // skar ma dang / chos grangs la sogs pa ni yar gyid dag la dgon mchog lag stsol ba btab phra bslab par bya'o// re ba dang rngam
117b8(rgyud): ba pa dag ni ma yin no// 'dod pa'i ngan du'ajam shing gnag pa la ni 'gal ba med do// dus rtag tu yi ma pa dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir byams pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pas bsgrub par
118a1(rgyud): / sprul pa'i khro bo rdo rje shugs can ni 'dod shin tu banug pa ste/ ra dang nga yir 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid gnam lugs kyi 'khor lo bsnams pa'o// rdo rje chags chen ni mdog
118a2(rgyud): chags padang rmugs par byed pa'i rang bzhin gyi mda' ga 'o// de nan po na swAng khA ste/ 'drin cing yongs su 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid lazhes kyu 'dzin pa'o// dadza' bar ba ni mdas
118a3(rgyud): dmar po ste/ mi shes pa dang mi shes pa 'jom pa'i bdag nyid kyi rdo rje'i brag 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje khro bo ni ser po ste/ khro ba dang khro ba'i bdag nyid kyi ral bri 'bar ba bsnams pa'o// 
118a4(rgyud): gdum chen ni mdog ljang nag ste/ btang snyoms dang btang snyoms su gyur pa'i bdag nyid kyi sprin gyi zhags pa 'dzin pa'o// rdo zab pa dag ni du ba'i mdog can bya ba dang pyid pa'i bdag nyid
118a5(rgyud): rnga bsnams pa'o// rdo rje stobs chen ni mthing ga ste/ dman pa dang dman pa'i rang bzhin can gyi gan ma lugs kyi 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje rje'i stobs ni dmar nag ste/ rton 'brel dang / 
118a6(rgyud): 'brel bar 'byung ba'i bdag nyid kyi be con 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje rab 'byed ni sna tshogs phrin las kyi mdog can mtha' dang mtha' las grol ba'i bdag nyid can gyi rdo rje rtse gcig pa bsnam
118a7(rgyud): bya'o// de dag ni bcu'i bdag nyid can gyi me 'bar ba'i sku'i las rab tu'i zla ba'o// 'phags pa mig yo bA zhes bya ba'i gzungs las le'u gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'ang

119a3(rgyud): dang s+tha dang sgra brnyan dang / gzugs dang / gzugs brnyan dang bcas bI kru nyi ma'i gdan pad ma dang tshogs kyi bdag po glang sna'i steng du bsams te/ thugs kyi sa bon pas ral gri me

119b4(rgyud): bdun spos kyi phyag rgya'o// sor mo rnams pha ni tshun du bsnol te nang du bcug nas/ mdzub mo mthe bos mnan pa ni me tog gi phyag rgya'o// mthe bo dang gung mo'i sor mo rtse spang de/ lcang

120a1(rgyud): / bi gre ta nA ra/ sarba b+hU ta ba yaM ka ra aT+Ta/ ha sa na ni taM b+ha gA tsa maM bA sa ni/ ku ru ku ru mArba d+harma NI/ ts+tshin d+haR+ShinaH/ sarba mnatra/ b+hin d+ha b+hin dA/ pa ra mnatra/ A kaR+Sha ya/ A

121b1(rgyud): yA yA/ na mo shAkya ma na ye/ tathA ga teSh+Tha/ a ra ta ta b+h+ya/ samya kas mdzad dA ya/ tad+yaH/ mu na drun ma hA mu ni ai dza ye/ dza ye/ shAkya she swA hA ya~M pAHba~M dza ya/ aM thAHniHye a

121b6(rgyud): ba li nAM/ aM a sam sa ma sa man to a nAM ta tA pA ba ti shA sa na ha ra ha ra/ smar smar Na/ bi ga ta rAg/ bung d+haHr+m+ma te/ sair sa ra/ si ma ba lI/ ha pa ha sa/ tra ya tra yA/ gA ka na mA hA
121b7(rgyud): lak+Sharbe dz+wa lA dz+wa la na sA ka re swA hA/ na maHsa man te bud d+hA ya/ na maHsarba bud d+hi bo d+hi satwA nAM/ oM ar dza bir dze/ ma hA bi ra dze/ ma hA bi ra dwai/ swa ra te sA ra te/ tra yI tA ye/ bi d+ha ma ne/ 
121b8(rgyud): ram ti/ sid d+ha a tra~M tra~M swA hA zhes brjod do// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rnam par dag pa'i gzengs te/ lan gcig 'dod pa tsam gyi
122a1(rgyud): // lha dang / sngags dang / phyagatu thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig gsum dang ldan pa'i gagrus rnyis dang / snga pa ma

122a3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dmachog gsum bkod pa'i khru ma 'di la brtson par bya'o// na maHsa man te bud d+hA nA~M/ tad+ya thA/ oM i ho shud d+he/ ma~M he shud rta shud d+ha
122a4(rgyud): shud d+he/ a shu maM bi shud d+he/ shud d+he shud d+he/ sa ma ya swA hA zhes 'arjod do// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dmachog gsum bkod pa'i gzungs te/ tshul sngags

122b2(rgyud): pa oM las byung ba'o// me'i dkyil 'khor dmar po gru gsum pa 'bar ba dang bcas pa r-I las so// de'i nang du b+h+rUM kha dog sna tshogs las byung ba'i khang bu brtsegs pa gru bzhi pa la

122b7(rgyud): steng du pad ma dang nyi ma'i gdan no// yi ge raM las byung ba'i nyi ma dang / maM las byung ba'i shes rab kyi mtshan ma maM dang ldan pa las brtsa
122b8(rgyud): gal ba nam mkha'i mdog can/ nyi ma'i snying pa la bus ma rag cing bzhugs pa'o// rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das rnam mapa'i ma lus pa 'ang kyis bkangs pa/ phyagagasas
123a1(rgyud): // nu la gribasnams pa/ g.yon na klu'i rgyal po'i zhags pa bsdams pa/ phuHphu zhes bya ba'i sgra 'don pa'o// shar du bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i rigs yi ge tsAm las byA

123a3(rgyud): rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' ma lus pa 'od kyis 'gengs pa/ phyag g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa/ g.yon pa na klu nor rgyas bsnams pa/ phu

123a7(rgyud): shes rab kyi mtshan mA maM dang ldan pa las/ bcom ldan 'das pad ma'i rigs kyi bdag nyid can gyi mi g.yo ba byi ru'i mdog can/ nyi ma'i snying po la pus mo rag cing bzhugs pa/ rin po
123a8(rgyud): che'i rgyan dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' ma lus pa 'od kyis 'gengs pa/ g.yas na ral gri bsdams pa/ g.yonan klu rgyal bsdams pa/ phuHphuHzhes bya
123b1(rgyud): pa'o// byung du bcom ldan pangs las b+hi / sa yis d+ha las byung ba'i shes rab kyi man nA ma dang ldan pa las/ bcom ldan 'das las kyi rigs kyi bdag nyid can gyi ches
123b2(rgyud): de nI la'i mdog can/ nyi ma'i snying po la pus mo rag cing bzhugs pa/ rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' ma lus pa 'od kyis 'gengs pa/ phyag g.yas na ral gri
123b3(rgyud): bsdams pa/ g.yon na klu rigs ldan bsnams pa/ phuHphuHzhes bya ba'i sku 'don pa'o// sher lho mtshams su raM las byung ba'i tri shU la raM gyis mtshan pa dang ldan pa'i zhal gcig
123b4(rgyud): pi'i khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba g.yis kyi dang pAn tri shA la/ g.yon gyi dang pon klu mtha' yas kyi bu/ g.yas g.yon gyi 'ogro me ni dza rje dang thod pa bsdams pa/ lho rlabs mtshams su/ 
123b5(rgyud): de las byung ba'i dbyug g+ho gis mtshan pa dang ldan pa'i gapa c-i phyug zhi pa'i gshin rje gshed pa pad+mar+ya'i mdog cam g.yas kyi dang pon rje rnga dbyug go// gi yon gyi dang pon+da k+Sha sa
123b6(rgyud): bzo// g.yas g.yon gyi 'og ma gnyis na thob phrer bu bsnams pa'o// rub byung mtshams sun las byung bI'i kha T+wAM gnas mtshan pa dang ldan pa'i zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa'i/ ma
123b7(rgyud): ru'i mdog can/ grayas kyi dang po na kha T+wAM ga g.yon gyi drang po na klu pa ma chen po bsnams pa/ g.yas yon gyi 'og men lcags sgrog bsnams pa'o// byang shar mtshams su hA
123b8(rgyud): nga ba'i be tson hUM gis mtshan pa dang ldan pa'i zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa'i bdud rtsi 'khyil ba in dra nI la'i mdog can/ g.yas kyi dang pon bai con/ g.yon gyi dang pon klu stobs kyis rgyu
124a1(rgyud): pa/ g.yas g.yon gyi ba ma gnyis bsnol nas bsdigs pa'o// shar lho'i gre chang la lA mo bdug pa ma mdog mthing ga srog phor 'dzin pa dang ldan pa/ lho nub
124a2(rgyud): lha mo mA tog ma mdog dkar ma matog 'dzin pa dang ldan pa'o// nub byung du lha mo mar me ma dmar mo mar me 'dzin pa/ byang shar du la modro cheb ma ljang gu dri chu bsdams pa'o// 
124a3(rgyud): de dag ni gzhon nu lang tsha la bab pa/ mdzes pa'i tshul can hraM las bskyed par bya'o// shar phyogs su lha mo rta'i gdong can kha dog dkar mo// lcags kyu bsnams pa'o// 
124a4(rgyud): su lha mogasar gyi mdog can zhag pa 'dzin pa'o// nub phyogs su lA mo dmar mo lcags lkog 'dzin pa'o// byang phyogs su lha mo ljang gu dril bu 'dzin pa'o// de dag ni nung zhig khros
124a5(rgyud): pa'i tshul can gyi phaT las bskyed par bya ste/ chos kyi da 'angs kyi rang bzhin la yongs su gnas par bsgom pa
124a6(rgyud): gzungs 'di gsungs so// na moHsa man ti brang d+ha nAM/ aM nan Da ma hA ro NahU~M phaT/ na maHsa man ta badz+ra nA/ dz+wa lo nyA bA~M ra ya hU~M pAr+than maHsa men badz+ra me a kro ta ka ya
124a7(rgyud): phaT/ na maHsa mAn ta 'adz+ran/ badz+ra krod+ha ha ya grI ba hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/ na maHsa man ta badz+ra nAM/ tra tha a maM b+ha a mr-i ta kurba Da lI hUM phaT/ na maHsa man ta prad d+ha nA~M/ tra tha badz+ra/ aH/ 
124a8(rgyud): la tse tad ha daha hUM phaT na maHsa man ta bud d+ha no/ ta tha ba/ a tsa la pa tsa la hUM phaT/ na maHsa man ta bung d+h+r-i nA~M/ tra tha pad+ma a tsa la tsa la ban d+ha hUM phaT/ na maHsa man ta bung
124b1(rgyud): sa la gams byab gsang+yas / ma ma stan pa dang / 'a / 'ad / sa sa pa da mas ni pa byung kyi
124b2(rgyud): pA'i las rnams 'dag pad+ma gyu / 'phyogs pa migs pa'i gzungs las pa dag pa 'aM/ dz+nyAnas banam ldan 'dus kyis la bzhin du gzungs sogs 'dib
124b3(rgyud): namaHa par ta bud d+hA nAM/ niH/ ma po / aHla kan/ tsaHtsanan/ na tan te/ ma ta na matan/ morba ta mona?H/ shata shAta/ tsarbata/ han ha ma/ da ha dang/ ma ha mo ha/ 
124b4(rgyud): pA pAM ka ra/ ha sa ha sa/ badz+rI ha sa a mo g+ha ku ru/ ha sa ha sa/ mar ta mar ta/ gardza garda/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ hA na ha na/ tiSh+Tha tit+ta/ A be sha ya A be sha ya/ ma hA man tra pa la ka/ dun d+ha na/ 
124b5(rgyud): me kha ta la ta/ sarba bi g+ha naM/ ma ra ya ma ra ya/ sarba hU~M/ \u0f7fT+Ta b+hAk+Sha sar+b+ba bi g+h+nAnamA pa rukAr+yA/ ma hA biH/ sar+b+ba pA pe/ mai d+ha ba rbo yA s+pho Ta ya/ dri ba lA~M t+ta ra g+han taka/ hUM trAM ma
124b6(rgyud): b+h+yaHsa man+ta d+ha bud d+ha naM/ many+dzuHNa la ro Na ya/ ya mr-iSh+Ta yaM haM/ a pra tita yaM / aT+Tale tsata yAnan tak+ShanAM/ tiHtiSh+Tha/ tsA r+raHpra/ ti di tipai ta rba tAH/ bi g+h+nAn nag+hA ta ya/ ma~M ya
124b7(rgyud): s+phoH ya/ sa tsa me/ i nr-i ban d+hi/ adz+ha ku ru ku ru/ a ha sa/ e nga na/ kra ka ta ma Ta/ ma Ta maT/ haM haM/ a ti pa la i ta ma hA gu tse ba shi na/ naT ta naT t+ta/ a bI sha yA/ a tsa la tsata/ sarba tra/ a
124b8(rgyud): me tata Ta taH/ Da ma Ta ma/ ti tsa ma~M ma phaT phaT na maHsa man ta badz+ra / dra a mo g+ha nan Ta ma hA ro Na s+phoT ya hU/ tra ma ya tra ma hA traT/ he me/ a~M ba lin tate ngo ba lin mAH
125a1(rgyud): sa man tawa dA nAM/ tsan Da ma hA po da Na/ a tsa la tse ta/ s+phoT la s+phoT ya hUM/ A sa man ti ka tratA/ ma hA la pha Ta bar mnatraM/ aM e haM haM/ shud d+ha d+he lokro tu b+he tu badz+ra/ a pra tiH
125a2(rgyud): tAbI 'e g+h+ra/ ma da tu sa ta ha sa na me he swA b+hU/ shes gsungs mi za tu 'dum buM dring na gnas pa'i sgra dang / lha ma yin dag / sgra dang / dge gnod sbyin dang / sbyin po dang / 
125a3(rgyud): cho ga gsungs pa dang / lugs sna lnga la byas pa'i ral gri/ zhu tshadang gsum pa byas te/ sdug sa
125a4(rgyud): phreng ba maM haM zhes bya ba bkod la/ khru do dang ldan pa'i spos kyi maN+DaDa la byas te/ mchod pa'i rdzas dang ldan pa'i dri bzhag ste/ gzungs sngags 'di khri phrag du brjod cing bzlas na ral gri nAm ma
125a5(rgyud): la 'phags par 'gyur ro// dedri nas g.yul du zhugs na dpag 'a som gyi shing yang dum bu dum bur gcod par 'gyur te/ g.yul las rgyal bar byed do// lcags sna lnga las byas pa'i lhung
125a6(rgyud): zed byas te/ haM mo zhes bya ba'i yi ge bkod de gser dang / dngul dang / zangs las byas pa'i bum par gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dpal bye'u dang / me tog dang / 'khor lo dang / nyid
125a7(rgyud): dung g.yas su 'khyil ba rnams dang / byi ru bcug pa'am/ yang na zangs la byi ru bcug pa byas la gsang sngags 'di grog 'am rus la b+his te/ khong pa'am mgul du btags nas gzungs
125a8(rgyud): sngags bye ba bzlas la lhung bzed bye ba bzlas la 'phags te gsol ba bta' na 'dod pa'i yon tan ci 'dod pa 'byung ste/ ljon pa'i shri bzhin no// nam mkha'i tI ta'i skye dang / 'uphya pa'i mi gdang
125b1(rgyud): nyis na mnyam pa dang / lpags snga gsum ci phye ma la khA ta li drag gi dri lu ba dran nam nyi tu gcig byas te/ thod pa dum bu gcig par bcug la gzungs sngags te maM shes byas pas
125b2(rgyud): bskor te/ gzungs sngags bye ba bzlas na pad+ma nam mkha' la 'phags te/ de mi dbugs dang bral ma thag gi snying gi khrag rlung dang sbyar te/ mig ni snang byed du bsam shing ral gri'i phyag rgyas mi
125b3(rgyud): rnabral bskus na thams cad mthong zhid thos la/ khar bcug na rang nyid sus kyang mi mthong bar 'gyur ro// na maHsa mAn ta bud d+hA nAM/ sarba ta thA ga te bA bA lo ki ti/ nga ya dza ya/ bAkyo don la ni
125b4(rgyud): ra bi sho d+ha ya swA hA/ rta lpags la bya rgod kyi tshil bu blugs nas mnyes te lham byas la/ haM dang maM rang gA nying mthil la bris te/ gzungs sngags bye ba be zlas na l+h+wam nam mkha' la 'phas
125b5(rgyud): dpal brgod kyi tshil ba bAgs nas gon na gar 'drod par phyin no// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAM/ oM bruM ma hA ye gr-i ta swA hA/ zhes bya bas nam mkha' la 'gro zhing 'phags te/ bya rgod bzhin du'o// skye
125b6(rgyud): 'dun pa'i sha dang / bya rgod kyi sha dang / rtsangs pa'i sha dang / sbrang rtsi rnams sbyar la 'de'u byis te/ gzungs sngags bye ba brjod de lus la byugs nas ramanye ba dang / nye'u shi pa dang / pram
125b7(rgyud): bar dang sbyar ba'i 'dre gu rnams nang re la srang de'i cha sbrang rtsi dang / bA ser skya'i 'o ma rnams btung ste/ zla ba gcig tu bsdudra na nam mkha' la thoms pa med do// rtanag po'i mig gnyis dkar ba
125b8(rgyud): bye ba nag pon pa gnyis dkar ba'am/ pha'ang dkar po'imang mi mang la nas smad gar ba'i smon chags lam bya'i tshulamang por du thug pa ma bzungs sdug sa bye sa bzlas te blud la/ de'i
126a1(rgyud): gnyis ma nor bar bton pa grib ma la skams nas ma rul ba'i phye ma lnga sngags 'di btab ste/ g.yas g.yon mnor bar blags na thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur ro// 
126a2(rgyud): 'grus pa'i spyan dang ldan par 'gyur ro// mon spos dang / kai gyung dang / s+yA m+bu'i zhen pa dang / nya mchis dang / rbaha dang / phrag don gyi mig dang sde dang / go nan+da dang / drug+sa pa
126a3(rgyud): ri lu byas te kham pA'i gzhur ri lu re re la gzungs sngags te maM zhes bya ba brjod de/ ga'u nam mkha' la 'phags nas/ na maHsa man ta bud tA nA~M/ na ma ye na ma hA ri bin+te shrI hrIH
126a4(rgyud): panA bdun btab nas byin na gang 'dod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// bya nod dang / bya grag dang / khwa dang / stag dang / spyang ki dang / wa dang / de rnams kyi mche ba dang / sder mo dang / bram ze'i
126a5(rgyud): pa'i zum pa la ba rangs sngags bzlas te/ bsgrub pa byas nas dus ma yin pa'i sprin dang sar ba dag la gtor na srin rnams 'thongar shing sa rab dang / 'brug dang/ srog la sogs pa 'i'i
126a6(rgyud): gyur ro// gtsun ban thams cad dang / sha ba thams cad dang / hrI dang / pha ba dang / da mo'i rtsig pa dang / gu gul dang skyer te/ dud pas bdugs na dom kun 'bros par 'brur //

126b1(rgyud): dam pa las thar ro// 'bum ze dang // glong dag/ shu ba dang / ma dpal dang / g.yan pa dag nye bar 'gyur ro// phan gcig 'a pas kyang mtshams med pa la sogs
126b2(rgyud): sdig pa zhi bar 'gyur ro// rig byed tshig gi dang po dang / gnyis pa'i drang por bcas pa ni gsum pa dag gi lnga par ldan cig/ bzhi pa'o na ba'i pa dang / lnga pa dag ga tsA pa'o/ 
126b3(rgyud): bzhi pa dang / mazer gnas pa'i gnyis pa la ni/ oM yis mtshan pa bri sa te/ uSh+ma rnams kyi gnyis pa dang / bzhi pa'i yi ga lnga pa dang / uSh+ma'i yi ge bzhi pA la su yis brgyar
126b4(rgyud): sdeng brnas pa/ sde tshan lnga pa dag gi ni/ dang po'i yi ge spangs pa dang / bzhi pa dang por po ces pa ni snying po'i yi ge brtag pa dag go 'i lo rno pas bcu pa bsgrub bya'i ming dang bcas pa bris
126b5(rgyud): nag po'i thod pa'i nang du gzug la/ gzungs sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ yungs kar gyis brab par bya'o// de nas klu yod pa'i gnas su khyer la rang gi lus la gla rtsis byug
126b6(rgyud): mig tu thod pa bcug lnga gzungs sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maSh+TaN Da ma hA ro nya hUM phaT/ na mo b+ha sa pa te bud d+ha bi ra ya/ tad+ya pra/ phuT pAH/ b+hu rA d+hA rA/ mi
126b7(rgyud): Ta paT/ phyag rgya ni sor mo rnams brkyang ste/ mthe' chung 'gug la mthe bos mnan te bskor bar bya'o// na mo radA tra yA ya/ na many+dzun+ta badzAkad+hA ta ba m+bI ba na mi mi li tsi la b+ho// banaH

127a2(rgyud): skye bor bgag nas sngags lan bdun brjod de ltung bar bya'o// bu k+kul dang / sangs ka dang / shI ban dang / dri na dang / nya'i mkhris pa dang / lkog s+t+ya dang /  dgapa rnams sgyu

127a4(rgyud): 'om da / mar dge / sdang ci dag bu ram dang / khAr dang / 'bras yos dang / dung dang / mtshal dang / rgya 'tsho'i wA ba la sogs pa dag 'a khar gzhod du thugs te/ yungs deg lag

127b3(rgyud): bas mchod par bya'o// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i gzungs las le'u brgyad pa'o// // de nas 'dam skyes pad+ma sa tshogs pa'i 'dab ma can gyi sed du a las byang ba'i chu'i dkyil
127b4(rgyud): steng du maM gyis bon las byung ba'i shes rab kyi mtshan ma dang ldan pa las 'phags pa 'jam dpal mngon pa'i sde byis pa lo brgyad gnyis len pa lta bu// gaper bcom 'am gur bum
127b5(rgyud): kha dog 'dra ba/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ sems dpa'i skyil mo brang gis bzhugs pa/ phyag g.yas pa na ral smi na ma mkha' la 'phyang ba/ g.yon pA ni po ti thags kar 'dzin pa

128a5(rgyud): d+harma d+hA tu bA g+h+ri shwa ra mu zhes brjod paswa shres rab dang ldan zhing thos pa 'dzin pa dang yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro// rin po che'i bum pa cu gang dang / gur gum dang / a ka ru dang / tsan
128a6(rgyud): na dkar ba dang / g+ha tsa la sogs pa dri'im pa'i r+g+ha thA s+yate/ na maHsarba tathA g+hA t+t+rak+Sh+Na/ a ra ha tI thA/ sarmugs bud drA ya/ tAR+thaH/ oM u ma raSh+TA ta ya/ d+hA m+b+hi/ bi shwA sa man+ta
128a7(rgyud): A gats+tsha ya/ A gan+d+ha ya/ du lu hu lu/ bruM pyA rl-i/ hUM hrI/ ri na dzig/ many+dzu shI ye/ su shrI ye ta rA ya me haM/ sarba du khe b+h+ya phaT phaT/ a mr-i tod b+ha ba sa ma ya~M sa ma yaM/ ud b+ha be/ sa

128b1(rgyud): dam man tan kha tra ya/ a ra ha ta \u0f7f/ sa byag sa bud d+ha ya/ ra mo many+dzu T+Ti ye/ bo d+hi satwA mra/ mahAs twa ga tang \u0f7f/ oM man+ta g+ha / ha na ham/ bcwa pa ma/ man ma mra mtha mtha/ d+ha
128b2(rgyud): khacu b+hU trA b+h+yaT+Ta b+hUl+la/ a bi sh+'u ya~M a bi sha ya/ tsa d+hAN+DaH/  ma / bas snga rnaMs/ d+hid la rba d+hi/ namaHsa pa d+ha ni/ pr-i byA sha ya/ larbaH/ kr-i tikr-i te/ pra ban b+ha/ pra bar d+ha/  @
128b3(rgyud): hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ zhes bya bas nad pa la 'bras kyi skye ma 'am/ til la btab ste khrus bya'o// bzungs sngags bzlas pas khrus byas pas/ las dang
128b4(rgyud): mongs pa dang / rnam par smin pa'i sdig bsngal las thar por 'gyur ro// ka ra'i shing ni mil sbyin sreg byas na yang gi bair 'gyur ngo ro// ral gril btab nas g.yul du zhugs nA g.yul
128b5(rgyud): rkyal bar 'gyur ro// spang ba dang ldan pas sku gzugs kyi mdun du bsgrub par bya zhing 'phags pa la gsal pa gdab par bya'o// grog 'am ras la bris te/ sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa la
128b6(rgyud): dgas par bya'o// srung pa la gzungs sngags btab ste mdud pa bya sa la srid kyis gdungs pa la btags te/ 'phags pa la gsol ba gdab par bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'ame mo dag smrang
128b7(rgyud): 'dug ste/ yi dam du 'don na lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / yi dwags dang / sha zla la sogs pa'i gdon mi 'byung ngo // gza' dang / chu skar dang / lce 'bab pa dang / dus ma yin pa'o

129a1(rgyud): shing thos pa 'dzin pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i bag chags spong ba la gzhol bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i sku thams cad thog pa med pa'i spyan gyis mthong
129a2(rgyud): ro// rigs kyi bu dang bu mo dag gis 'di lan gcig gam/ lan gsum mam/ bdun nam/ nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ bcu rtsa brgyad du brjod par byed na da'i lu so la mdze dang / bol sdig
129a3(rgyud): dang / 'bras dang / shu ba dang / g.yan pa dang / lkog ma'i lha gor na ba dang / mig dang / rna bA dang / son pa la sogs pa dag mi 'byung ngo zhes gsungs so// 
129a4(rgyud): zhal 'dzum pa mdzad de/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo kun nas 'dug pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag ste/ sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dwags dang / dud 'gro dang / 
129a5(rgyud): 'i 'jig rten du 'od kyis khyab par mdzad do// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul da'ang bye
129a6(rgyud): man chad khyab par mdzad do// bsam gtan dang po'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag go// bsam gtan dang po nas langs te bsam gtan gnyis pa la mnyam par bzhag go/ 
129a7(rgyud): langs te bsam gtan gsum pa la mnyam par bzhag go// gsum pa las langs nas bsam gtan bzhi pa la mnyam par gzhag go// bsam gtan bzhi pa las langs nas nam ma
129a8(rgyud): layas skye mched la mnyam par bzhag go// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la mnyam par gzhag go// rnam shes mtha'
129b1(rgyud): mched kas langs nas nI yang med pa'i skye mched la rnam par bzhag go// mi yang med pa'i skye mched las langs nas yang min mer min skye mched la mnyam par bzhag go// delas langs na
129b2(rgyud): de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag go// de nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ khyang bar mardzas dpa' kun tu bzang po dang / nam mkha'i snying po dag / sdi
129b3(rgyud): rnam par spel ba dang / 'jam dpal dang / sman ngas gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / byams pa la sogs pa rnams mngon par dga'o// lha dang / mi dang / lA ma yin dang / rnamam

135a2(rgyud): naM maHsanA saM pa ri pu ra ke b+h+yaH/ sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba b+hU A tsA lAn na/ nAT+ra nan+tha/ mon+no moT+Ta/ saT+Ta sar+b+ba taTA ta TA/ tir+the tiny+dza A be sha aHmaH/ ma la ka d+ha Na d+hA na/ ti Ni ti Ni/ khA da khA da/

135a4(rgyud): DA nr-i ma hA ba la sa twa mer lA/ tI maM te/ shu du lo ka/ dukun du badz+ri na mA hA pra ti ta ta ba la b+h+yo/ nga la ma hAta/ a sa ta na ma swA hA/ gsang ba'i snying po'o// de nas phyag rgya sbyangs stabs
135a5(rgyud): kyis sngags brjod pa ni 'dir gsungs so// na maHsad+hi saM bA rI pra rA ge b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga ti b+h+yaHsarba k+She/ a ha na ha na mA ra mA ra ya d+ha na// ga Nag hU~M phaT/ ral gri'i phyag rgya'i sngags so// 
135a6(rgyud): maHserbAs pa pur ke b+h+yaH/ sam khA ga l+leHsa rba/  sa shar / ba sha ni/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ ma hA ma bye/ d+ham ti m+b+ha \u0f7fgags pa'i yo/ na maHsa smras pa pra
135b1(rgyud): sas ta thA ga te b+h+ya saHk+Sha rak+Sha har ham/ bcwa tu mA ra ya duSh+Ta bi nA ya ke b+he / go cha'o'o// na maHma nus pa ri pu ra be b+h+yaH/ sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ oM d+ha ra d+ha ra badz+ran li/ 
135b2(rgyud): rA sha d+hA ra kA d+hi/ kanag tar gyi 'o// namaHsarnas pa pu ke b+h+yaH/ sarbe ta rdege b+h+yaH/ san+na thA/ oM b+h+yaTAbanA d+hA dAthA mA sli kra ru ku ru han ta na bang+ga/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na phaT/ za ba'i 'o// na maHsa
135b3(rgyud): pu ra ki b+h+yasarba tan ga te b+h+yaHsarbar+tha/ oMn+dan ta mur ti/ da ho da ta/ sA d+ha ye sA d+ho la~M/ bi dza ya bi dzi ye/ bi dza la kIr ti sIH/ mgon pa'i phyag rgya'o// ni maHsa rnas pa ri pra be b+h+yaH/ sa te
135b4(rgyud): teb+h+yaHsar+b+ba d+ha/ oM shwa d+ha da d+hA re/ a tsan bya ba la ba la ma r+the/ bur bu sa la ya~M/ rak+Sha rak+Sha sarba sA pra/ rdo ba'i phyag rgya'o// na maHsa nA sa pa ri pu ra ke b+h+yaH/ sarba ta nAg te b+h+yaH/ sarba b+h+yo/ 
135b5(rgyud): da ma ti gi bAH/ stong ba'i phyag rgya'o// na maHsan+na sa pa ri pu ra ke b+h+yaH/ sarba ta thAg ti b+h+yaH/ sarbanA/ oM hud tad hA/ kin tsi rA ya sI/ An ya shIg+h+na/ rak+Sha rak+Sha ban du ban d+ha/ duH/ dam
135b6(rgyud): phyogs bcing ba'o// na maHsarbA su pa ri pu ra kaM b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sar+b+ba bA/ oM dun du nA mAs+sa bA sha ga ga d+ha ra/ sa pa ringang dke swA hA/ bka'i rtags kyi'o// na maHma rgyas
135b7(rgyud): ke b+h+rar+m+ma sarba twa thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba// oM ga gan ga na dod b+ha ga ma hA sa ma yo/ pa ri nga ke swA hA/ gri'i phyag rgya'o// na mdu sarmas pa ri pur ki byaH/ sarba tan ga ta b+h+yaHsa pa/ 
135b8(rgyud): nan jim b+ha be ga ga n+d+ha ne hA swA hA/ ma mo phyag rgya'o// na maHsa nA sa pa ri pu ra keny+tsaH/ sarba ta thA ka taH/ sarbaH/ oM shung+ga d+ham te/ shud d+ha bu dang / gr-i tA kr-iH/ sams par pu
136a1(rgyud): / swArmA/ gtor ba'i phyag cu'o// namaHsa nas pa dI thA saSh+TA An d+ha/ ga tu sa sarbA /  shwad d+ha mahAdz+nyAn swA rbA gre tiSh+ThaN+Di ma ldan se smra/ bdug pa'i
136a2(rgyud): sarnas pa R+R-i/ rgyus / b+h+ya // gas na'i gas ma / ma tan y-i//  na g+hu klus
136a3(rgyud): ha ni/ pa ra ma bi shud d+hi/ d+harma na ya pa rI pu ra ke b+h+yaHswA hA/ sam bas kyi mo// na maHsarbA sa pa ri pu ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM ma pra ti daM don d+ya ta/ ra mad mo/ sarba thA/ sapa
136a4(rgyud): pu dke b+h+ya swA hA/ da ba'i ba spyan drang ba'i ljon na mings sbas pa ri bu rag b+h+yaHsapa twA thAg te b+h+yaHsa rba b+h+yo/ oM'i shud d+ha bi shod b+ha sa rbaswa b+ha ba An ya mi ldan ye swA g+hu byang chub se

136a6(rgyud): sa pa ri pr-ir ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba TA/ oM bad+hA kar ShA ya/ shIk+She/ da ha da ha/ paT pa ma mahA pa ri wA ra swAh+ma pho \u0f85pha ma spyan drang ba'o// na maHsa rnam pa'i pu
136a7(rgyud): san ta thAg te b+h+yoHsam mo mas man/  las na la/ khe phen pa thamanas la ma ga ma / mthan ya pa ril ston tu/ 'jig rten pa rnams mun drang ba'o//  maHsa
136a8(rgyud): ri pu ki b+h+yaH/ sirba ta thA ga he b+h+yaH/ sa sa na chos bya sa / ma byas rgyag/  mad ma/ mdzang mkham ga ga la A kar dz+wa lalam byab ma bAn la shub rtes hA/ grang se sun drang pa'o//  ma
136b1(rgyud): ApA'i rbang byaHsas thAg ta b+h+yas saH/ nga pang ya/ bi nga la'i ngag ma thas byab ti mi sa b+ta ti shA bla sring po rnams spyan drang ba'o// nam gnas pa ri du b+h+yaHsarba ta thAg ta Sh+TaH
136b2(rgyud): hrihA dA/ ma tha ma tha/ da ma dA ma/ de nad na/ ma ha na ye/ mA ra ma ra ha sA hA/ ma mo rnams spyan drang pa'o// na maHsarbA sa pa ri pra ro ka b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM da nA badz+ra hU~M phaT/ sarba
136b3(rgyud): pa tha mtha/ b+haSh+Ta b+hany+dza/ sarba b+hik+Sh+Na/ da mad ma/ sarba dud+d+ha oM hU~M phaT swA hA/ rkang skyabs tsam rom gyi sngags sa// na maHsa nA sa pa ri p+sa ra ka~M b+h+yaH/ sarba te thA ga ta b+h+yaHsatwA thA/ oM aHhUM/ A kA shag
136b4(rgyud): dam be sa ng+ga/ 'o zug 'bur ba dbru snga tshogs/ spos dang me tog la mashes pa/ ci 'byor 'byor pa'i gtor ma mi/ sngags des sla shing spel bar bya/ na mAHga nos pa bu ra ge byung sa ta thA ga
136b5(rgyud): / oMs b+hA bA sarba thA/ hU~M b+he swAH/ na maHsa nas pa ri wang ke b+h+yas sas ta thAg ta byungs pa/ oM lab ta san sa yin lab d+ha sa swAhA/ dmaHmnus pa ri prAng ge phyags ga mag te byags pa sa/ ma
136b6(rgyud): dad+hi d+ha d+ha mo hi swAH/ byin brlabs bzhin du bsnur ba dang / kun gyim thim par bya ba dang // 'dod pa'i las rnams gang dang gang // grub par bya ba'i sngags yin no// gza' chen brgyad dang rtswa skar dang / 
136b7(rgyud): te shu rtsa brkyang rnams kyi sngags// na maHsanI sa pa ri pu ra ke b+h+yaH/ sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ A di t+ya/ so ma aM pA ra
136b8(rgyud): ru rab su su sus ma hA pra rA ba la tsa su ha ra la 'dzum ta rkyen d+he/ bi Ak+Sha/ a ru d+ha/ ra yul su wang d+ha/  yuta ta radUT+Ta tha~Mg d+hA a b+hi ri ti/ sha ta gyi sa/ rgya // 
137a1(rgyud): dA/ u ta ta ra b+ha d+ha/ rIb ti a sha mI/ b+ha ra mI/ oM dang sA hAr bcas pa ni/ rang rang snying po'i sngags yin te/ gang 'dod las kyang sbyar bar bya/ mchod pa'i rigs kyang
137a2(rgyud): dang b+ha/ na maHsa man ta kA yA wA ka nIHbadz+rAr+tha/ oM a ma la kaH me pon so ya tra ka Sha haM ma~M/ na maHsa mAn ta kA ya wA ga ci badz+rA na/ oM badz+rag brtsa drug/ yon baHsarba
137a3(rgyud): / sarba b+ha ya bi ga ta b+h+yaHbi sha mu kha~M b+h+yaHsarba gra ba~M rak+Sha ma hA ba laM/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga te pu n+ya ne dzA ti hU~Mrl-i tra nA a pra tI ha ta swA hA/ khro bo sman gcig drag shul can/ bsrang dang bcas par
137a4(rgyud): dong // ljags bzlas dngos gab blangs pas 'grub// ci 'dod las la tshogs sbyar// lag g.yas zung mjung gshibs te brkyang // phrin lag maze'u chung mthe bos mnag/ thugs dang
137a5(rgyud): nga mkha' la sbyar// ral bri'i phyag rgyas bdud tshogs 'joms// g.yon pa lu tshur sdigs mdzub bzheng // slar bskur byed pa zhags pa'i rtsa// gung mo mthe'u chung so sor skad// mdzu
137a6(rgyud): bad med nang du dkrug/ mthe bo gshibs pa khung 'jam sar// snying gar bkod de go che'i rlan// sor bkad lu dar nang du bsdam// mthe ba gnyis cang bsar g.yo bong / 
137a7(rgyud): tshur mthe bo ni// g.yas pa'i khu tshur nang bcug nas// mthe bong g.yas bsgreng tho ba'i nga// phyogs bcur brdungs pa lhur bya'o// g.yas pa tshu po bzheng // 
137a8(rgyud): rgya gtsug tu bzhag/ g.yon pa khu tshur gung mdzub bsgreng // bka' tag sa phyag kya rtag tu kyar// ku tshur gnyis bshigs s+ho sbyang ba// dog lta ba rgya'o// g.yas pa
137b1(rgyud): ra gzhug/ snying ga brgyan pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag gnyis sor mo sngo sor brkyang // phyogs bcu pa yi phyag rgya'o// lag sbyang gung gnyis nang bcug pa// dri'i phyag kya shad pa'o// khu chur rgyab snga
137b2(rgyud): nga mtho bong // mam po lung mdzub skad dang yud// gtor ma sbyin pa'i phyag tu'o// thal mo khong skyong zhubs ltar gdos// 'dug thos 'bral bu'i byak+Sha au/  smos pagang spen pa
137b3(rgyud): mtheb mnan bzhag brgyad me togaH// dul spya krung srin mdzub mo 'jug/ mthe chung mabyeb brgya ga pa zas kyi// skyi ba 'ang bdub ste snyim pa zed // ma tha po gnyis ni nang
137b4(rgyud): shibs nas gas 'byed pa ni// dpa' banas 'i sun dang // zhes byar mdzub bag sas so pa dan// byang chub sems sa 'grums pa'iH// khyim bskyed pa de chung gi shibs
137b5(rgyud): gam brgyad pos sa dkug/ ldan thos rang rgyal rngu 'phrul can// mo gus thams cad bzhugs pa'i rgya// khu ra g.yas pa g.yon steng bzhag/ mdzub gnyis brkyang skye sa sor dkrug
137b6(rgyud): da bskyed par byed pa ni// pheM nya pho mo 'gugs pa'i bri// khu tshur chub spang gur mdzub ni// so sor drang por gshibs te brgyad // mchomo gnyis cung zad srung de dgug/ 'jig rten pa rnams
137b7(rgyud): pa'i rtsa// de yon min g.yas pas de ltar bya// brtul zhugs drang srong dgug pa'i rtsa// g.yon pa zur tshur gung mo bsgreng // dngos grub sring mo 'gug pa'i // lag g.yas pa na te 'ang
137b8(rgyud): kyang // mthe bos mdzub mnan gsum thagayab// ma bdun la sogs ma mo rnams// las kyi dus su 'khrugs par 'gyur// ris kyis bteg cing drung ba mi// bras mo dag la rkang mthol
138a1(rgyud): // spyi bor me tog thal sbyar yang // phyogs der g.yob cing 'du tshugs lta// rnam pa'i thabs kyis 'di kun gyis// bgegs tshegs 'joms shing rnal 'byor bsrung //

138a8(rgyud): 'dadag na bya// dang ga la bus 'brud lag pa gnyis// blam ba sgra na cig gis lanan// bgegs paspyang bye na 'bru rmugs paste// bci ga dngas na sra na// 
138b1(rgyud): g.yon res kyis bskor// lho byang g.yon te shar dub g.yas// brgyad zhing drag tu bas par bya// rgyab nas drang dang thob dang // rdo rje dang ni zhags pa'i rtsa// phyogs bzhir bya ste 'khor lo skyangs/

138b3(rgyud): stobs kyad par bshad par bya// shar du rkang pa mnyam pa yis// rdo rje thal mo gyen du brdeg/ lhor ni rkang ting skad de gdang // hUM sgrogs pal me mdun rgyab sbyar// rub du ting slad lag pa ga
138b4(rgyud): sdor sdigs mdzub chen du bcang // byang du ral sI'i phyag rgya dang // rkang pa la gtsigs la bskyed// ku tshur madrub sbyar dpral bar bzlog/ rlung gnyis mnyam byas res kyis phyer//

140b1(rgyud): la rgya mtsho thun// sna tshogs de dag kun zhi nas// 'ga' yang sdug bsngal med par shog/ sems can gang dag lus ngag yid// mi dge spyad pa bral thur nas// dge ba phran tshogs skye

140b4(rgyud): 'bar 'gro bra la// brtse phyir blar yang 'byin par mdzod// de nas gtor ma me tog dri/ dkyil 'khor rgyan dang rdul tshon rnamapa// dngos grub dam tshig gnod spang phyir// lag pas reg sa

140b7(rgyud): brgyad dus su mchod// bla ma la ni yon dbul zhing // rtag tu sngags 'dzin thams cad kyang // mnyen par bya ba'i khros pa min// sems can ma mos spang bar bya// dkon mchog gsum la

141a1(rgyud): / za' nying btung bar bya// mang pas gnyid dang le lo dang // dring ba ni bskyed par 'gyur// tho rangs dang por langs nas ni// skrod thal bar du brtson par bya// nam gyi gung la
141a2(rgyud): pa rnams kyis ma // 'bugs pa slus pa napa A / sa dun pa
141a3(rgyud): lha bsgom pa yi rim pa ni// rang gzugs stong par byas nas su// yi ge phreng ba'i 'khor lo las// sgra grags pa ni rig pa che// zla ba'i gzugs pa rnyan lta bu
141a4(rgyud): son pa ni rdo rje sogs// rang gi phyag rgya nyid yin no// de nas/ de las gyur pa'i sku mchog ni// 'ja' tshon shar ba ji ltar ba rA// mtshan dpe mdangs 'od yang dag ldan// 
141a5(rgyud): cing dgyes pa'i mdangs dang ldan// sgeg cing rol pa'i cha byad ni// byisra pa gzhon nu'i lang tshe 'dra// rin chen rgyan dang na bza' ni// gzugs mdzes lha yi ci lta ba// khros pa'i
141a6(rgyud): po lta bu ste// swA dang kha sbrul sogs pa// su sogs ser shing rtsub la 'khyim// sna tshogs dur khrod rgyan rnams ni// rtsub cing blo ldan rab tu sa// na bza' rlon pa khrag can ni// 
141a7(rgyud): khyams su yod par mdzad// ha hAhU~M hU~M phaT pA gyi// ngang skad 'brugs skyugs kyu nis ri rab 'bum brgyal chal chom ldar// lusI rag ltos 'gros brgyan pa ni// ga zi ldan
141a8(rgyud): zla bdon// 'phro 'du 'od kyi dkyil 'khor ni/ nyi 'bum dus ma'i bsgom pa 'dra// rab 'dug mtshon cha du ma ni// lha min dus kyi 'khrug pa'i cha// khro bo khro mo'i tshigs 'byung ba/ 
141b1(rgyud): yu cad mi rnam/ ya mad mas du rtson pas/ rlom dag pa med pa// dab pa yin rnam / sa yin mnyan chogs/ 'a na ts+tsha rnas
141b2(rgyud): spya/ rna maHsa / ke b+h+yab+hA pa da / b+h+ya smras/ yam stsu pa du ma tegaganas zadag tus zlab pa shu ste/ mtshan la pa sa sa pa rnam la sems rgya
141b3(rgyud): nas/ sdig pa thams cad rab tu gi/ ngang tshul bzang por yang dag byung // rig par gyur pa'i sems ldan nas// drang song rdzu 'phrur can du 'gyur// gzhan yang sdug bsngal ni nus na// rang gi de
141b4(rgyud): blos ci dgos// rang rang rig kyi lha rnams kyi// gzugs brtan byab mtshan la dog ni// dkyil 'byor dam no ras ma las// gsung ba'i ltar bskam par bya// de nas mig yo bre ba tshe// rdo rje 'dzin pa phyag
141b5(rgyud): chal nas// dag cing gsal la snyan pa yi// tshig gis kyang ni 'di gsol to// rdo 'dzin pa bcom ldan 'das// gtum po mtshan nyid rab ldan pa'o// nga yi mtshan nyid byed pa du nas/ 
141b6(rgyud): 'dzin rgyal pos// gtum mo'i cha byad ldan byas nas// rang gzugs sngags dang bcas pa yis// gsang chen brda 'di bka' stsal to// dag pa'i sems nyid hU~M do // mthing na'i mdog la
141b7(rgyud): rje 'dzin mthi ga brkyang bskum khro sems nan// na ra'i rgyan bcus 'jigs byed su// gyen sA la spu gyod ser dmar// pad ma zla ba'i steng du ni// me yi nang bzhugs dor dril 'chi ba// nam sna
141b8(rgyud): 'dzin dang gnyis dang po// ban pa'i lnga pa de'i gsum pa// lnga pa'i lnga pa bdun pa'i po'o// ma yim ben dbug pa mnan// bdun pa'i dang po gsum pa yin// gsum pas brten
142a1(rgyud): // bcas// gsang sngags rgyal po bla med 'di// dgos pa thams cad 'grub pa dang // khyad par du ni 'byung po sel// klu 'dul ba ni dkar po che// nam mkha' lding gi cha bud che// chu
142a2(rgyud): ba'i gter gyi don du ni// ser po 'od dang ldan pa lI// dbar po dang ni ldang nag dag dra po'i gdon rnams sel ba dang // tshwa ring pa la shis pa'o// lhag pa bskyed pa'i sku mchog ni// 
142a3(rgyud): nga thams cad pun nag 'khrig/ bdud nams thams cad rab tu tshig/ ye shes me 'od chen po 'di// bzod pa slal gcig ma mchis// bgegs chen log pa
142a4(rgyud): ba rnams// dogs pa'i sems kyis zag ring 'byos// gsang sngags yi ge hUM swa can// glog 'brug pa yi 'od zer 'dra// klad pA yi ge haM gi gzugs// gru gsum me yi gzugs brnyan can// 
142a5(rgyud): / 'od dmar tshal ba rab 'thor bas// bgegs tshogs sreg cing 'bros par byed// khong bu rnga mo khri spre'u gzugs// ro langs me lus thams cad kun// hA ha brjod cing 'bros par byed
142a6(rgyud): gis ga sbeng ba'i mub dang mtshungs// gyen nur b+ha gI 'phro 'du dang // khro bcus bon yi ge b+h+rUM/ me dang rlung gi tshul du 'bar// mngon sum nA la me bzhin du// keng gi hU~M gis 'das nas kyang

142a8(rgyud): de/ bgegs dang log 'dren ma lus pa// srel cing phyi ma rdul du rlog/ snying nang snying po bstan pa ni// 'od 'bar 'od kyis sdig pa'i tshogs// du ma rnams kyang zad par mdzad// lus

142b2(rgyud): was nams kyang 'dar 'gyur na// bgegs rnams sres pa smos ci dgos/ gas ma yA s+t+wa~M a he bi ra/ ye shes rtswa dang 'brel par bya/ rgyal gyis dbang bskur myor bas ni// ye shes dbu rgyan btag par bya/ 
142b3(rgyud): gcol mi baspyod dbu rgyan can// 'khor kun mi g.yos rgyas gdab bya// bdag nyid yi ger byas nas sra/ mi gzugs shin tu phra bas ni// mtshan mo dus su nyams par bya// sdang ba hU~M gI sgra las so//

143a1(rgyud): // las rgyal gyur te// rdo rje lta bur brtan byed pas// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu gzung // oM sar+b+ba badz+ra a g+neShiSh+Thadz+dza/ dril bu dbyangs spyan bla na med// sku yi rdornga rab bsku

147b1(rgyud): lob par 'gyur// 'khor lo bdun sogs mtshan cha dang // gos drang mal lham tshangs skud sogs// dgos pa thams cad de ltar sgrug/ sngon gyi tshul du dngos grub 'byung // chos gcig nyin pa

152b4(rgyud): rulde na 'am dug dang tshi/  dur lnga tsha ba gsum// sol ba la ni dag 'thugs ga/ lung ga mar blags te bsregs na 'chi/ tsha gsum pa yi 'bras bu yis// nim pa'i 'dab mar dag mang gri// thod par dug pu

153a2(rgyud): yang na shing skam lta bung skams// dam pa'i dadang rang byur bcas// dgra pa grang ba'i rloms kyis 'ad bas// kha'i sna e raN Da'i mar lus// blag pa 'dra ngur mel bsreg/ lag stobs

166a6(rgyud): sngags 'chang chen po rnams dang / spyan chen mo la sogs pa rig sngags 'chang chen po rnams dang / rdo rje snying po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / rdo rje zhags pa la sogs
