178a6(rgyud): pa'i 'od bzang ba// sa yi snying po snying po che// rdo rje'i snying po rnam par 'dren// dpag tu med pa dpag med rdzogs// khyad par 'phags pa'i yul la gnas// zab kyi gsam pa'i gtso bo de// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
178a7(rgyud): zer bsil// dga' dang dang ba bskyed pa ste// ye shes rgya chen spyod yul pa// rlung gis drag shul lta bur drag/ drug po lags te drag bsel gtsang // rgyal bar byed cing dral ba'i// rgyal ba'i dpal ma de dga'
178a8(rgyud): ram dang// spun gyito se mal yis// spyod yul bapa mo non pa ste// rin chen rdo rje snying poH// sa ga ni'i spyod yul mda' ba lags// rin chen thag las byung ba'i 'od// dora'i dkyil 'khor da/ 
178b1(rgyud): // de bzhin gtsunas r+b+ba spyad dkyus pa// rmugs drag dpal gyi gan tan lags// rapags pa dpa' ma dgatsang mato// phyogs bcu 'dabang phyug dbang thug mo// dkyu tshang carog tu
178b2(rgyud): rgyad mchog rnams kyis// de rje khrims dpa' bstod napa ni// de 'i sa gsum pa chog sras// yon tan snyi po zhes rnams kyis ming brgya rgya brgyad mchog 'arjod cing // nyes bzlog pa 'di sas gzhan
178b3(rgyud): nangs ma mthong // ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di// thams cad 'grub byed dga' ba ste// sdig pa rnams cad sel ba dang // ri makun thal yon tan des// de phyir bsgrub pa thams cad kyis// phun sum tshogs pa/ 
178b4(rgyud): drod pa'i mis ming brgya rtsa brgyad dge ba di// rtag tu yang ni brjod par gyis// ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di// bsam pa kun dang 'byor pa yi// gnas mchog blar med pa ste// dpal yon rgya chen pa'i
178b5(rgyud): / yid ni shin du dang ma nga// mal gyi mam tshan gas lag/ da bas la ban/ yo rkye da mchod ni gang 'dod dang / dpal khon rgya chen 'dzin pa yi// ming bcurtsa brgyad dam pa'idid/ 
178b6(rgyud): 'dod byed pa// sdug snga la kun las sar du 'tho'o// 'phags pa pa'i snying por mtshan caca brgyang pagazungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs s+ho// sangs rgyas 'khor brgya dang bcas pa'i mtshan
178b7(rgyud): zungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs s+ho// rgyaka \u0f7f/ dang/ an mam bAr spyan rtsa ya gtag/ bod ta dang/ 'bigs paspyan dpag zigs dbang phyug gi mtshan+da cu tu bcud pa zhes byag/ sangs rgyas pa
178b8(rgyud): ba sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis khros pa dus gcig / bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas// ri klu 'dzin gyi rtse mo me tog dri zhim po sna tshos
179a1(rgyud): / babs pa/ 'dzes bu chu bo'i gseng ba dog pa'ang po ltar sdang ba// rin po che sna tshogs snang ba'i sa phyogs na bzhugs te/ lha dag klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lha ma yi dang / nam mkha' ldings
179a2(rgyud): ni'ab ci dang / kun rgya chan dod mid/ mim yin pa bye khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la bsti stang du byas blam byay-i/ ri mor byas te/ mchod cing brjod napa/ yongs su bskor cing mdun
179a3(rgyud): kyis bltas nas chos ston te/ tshangs par spyod ga thogam dgeg par dge gzalar dge gdon bzang po// tshig 'bru bang po ma 'dren payongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su byung ba yang dag par rab tu ston to// de nas tshangs
179a4(rgyud): pal sogs pas 'phags paspyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bstod pa// kye bcom ldan 'das/ dgongs pa mdad pa/ mdzang mu mdzad pa/ phur por la bdag gi don rjes su brnyes pa/ srid par kun du sbyor
179a5(rgyud): / yongs su bas pa/ yang dag pa'i mkhyen pas thugs shin du rnam par grol ga/ cad mkhyen pa/ glang po che chen po dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang shi dam pa'i pha rol tu byon pa// ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su
179a6(rgyud): / rdzogs pa/ srid pa'i dgon pa las rgal ga/ gzhan la sman pa/ thugs rje dang 'brel ba'i thugs mnga' ga skye yul mchog tu mnyen gshin pa/ bde ba rab tu stsol bar mdzadu pa/ byams pas zhugs pa/ sems
179a7(rgyud): can mtha' yas bsgol ba la mkhas pa/ bde ba gshegs pa'i sras po// srid pa gsum gyi rtsa lag gcig pu/ 'dod chags mi mnga' ga/ zhe sdang mi mnga' ba/ gti mug mi mnga' ba/ drim gsum spangs pa
179a8(rgyud): riri pa gsum gyi pha rol tu bshegs pa/ mngon par shes pa dag bces pa/ shing mgro ngamam ma she gsal mes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mnga' ba/ dpe bang bzang po 'chang cas 'chan pa
179b1(rgyud): mngon sa ASh+Ta gas//  pa ga kyi kyi snod rgyag ga ma gas pa 'odas pa snyed ma
179b2(rgyud): glu 'bar ba'i 'od 'dam gang ma ni bog mun par rdzogs pa pa'i brjid rgya tshig kun+dan 'araka dis zugatsug to mau 'ag nor bu ba tu 'brir ba/ mchod phyir pogs sprul ser sa
179b3(rgyud): thogs pas ba tu rnam par 'byed pa/ sa rlos hU~M byin pa ban nabs dang ldan te/ tshus rnams mnyams pa/ rgyas thoms sa skye pa// sang gi ltang bang ka' phyes gcel/ skyeb ngam ning mings pa/ 
179b4(rgyud): gas zang ma pa'i mazin da byug par mi dang gas dang skye ba ni mang sa kyi sa don dang 'jis sgyu sa nga rgyam ma mam chen g.yon pa 'dug/ 
179b5(rgyud): sru'ang nid rgyas pa/ tshangs pa spyar dbyangs nub pa/ yid du mchi bstag pa/ bstan mug yA nyams dga' bar bgyid pa/ 'od pa ma 'dra ba/ padA ma las zungs pa/ yang ma las byung ba/ pad mya'i gang
179b6(rgyud): 'grugs pa/ b+h+yashA / rkyeshAn ri ste gags sna pa na sbyin pas pa/ skye mas pa/ gang 'i nong bu bsdums gsus cingag gis
179b7(rgyud): de rtsi'i char 'bebs pa/ yid bzhin gyi ne bu lta bri/ bstan snga/ 
180a1(rgyud): ga/  ga nga gshegs pa ma byang mang /  gshegs pa'i ring srel 'dzi dag smrar daskyes pasams ga// bsod nams su dag dag
180a2(rgyud): mdad pa/ nges par mad pa/ brtson 'grus 'bang ba/ 'khor ba las shin du gnas gdas pa'i chos la rgyal tshab tu dbang bsrung ga/ sgrol ma ni bso drung na gnas pa// khro gnyer can bka' bzhin bgyid pa/ 
180a3(rgyud): dang ldanaH/ tshul dang lda ga / dran pa dang ldan pa/ mthu rtsal che ba/ yon tan dang ldan pa/ byams pa dang ldan pazhi ba dang ldan pa/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ skal ba dang ldan pa/ don dang ldan pa/ don rnams thugs
180a4(rgyud): rlung ba/ the tsom rnams gcod pa/ chos rnams gsung ba/ 'jig rten rnams kyi ston pa/ zhal gyi dkyil 'khor yongs su rgyas pa/ sku rked pa'i phyogs rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa/ gser gyi
180a5(rgyud): rdzong lta bu// sku nyi ma stong pas lhag par mdzes pa/ tshangs pa'i dbang po lnga sogs pas phyag bkyis pa lags so// gang la la zhig/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya
180a6(rgyud): bkyed pas bstod pa sgrub pa byed pa de'i mtshams med pa lnga'i las kyi sgrib pa rnam par byang bar 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugaso par 'gyur ro// de la gseng sngags thams ca
180a7(rgyud): grub par 'gyur ro// brgal 'bye ba 'bum phrag du mar dran 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// mtshams med par 'jug pa mi 'gyur ro// su nig nang bar langs nas 'don tam/ klog gam/ kha ton
180a8(rgyud): na de'i sus la mdzo dang / nang bu dang / sra pa dang mi de ba mi 'byung zhing nang thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro// tshe rabs sa cag tu che rabs dran par 'gyur ro// lha'i bu dang 'a
180b1(rgyud): wa //  du ngadu bya tu phags bskyed sa ga lpags dang drug dang ma 'bram sa 'thang po// tan tu gazlas rjod byas na
180b2(rgyud): gzhungs par 'gyur/ dpa' bar 'gyur/ skad snyan par 'gyur/ skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro// bstan bcom thams cad la 'jigs pa med par 'gyur// tshig btsun par 'gyur ro// bstod pa sgrub par 'di
180b3(rgyud): bstod pa byas na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung drug cu rtsa gnyis sred kyi bye ma srid dag la mchod byal par 'gyur te// rnam par sman pa mtshungs shing bye brag med par 'gyur ro// 'a
180b4(rgyud): paspyad ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rgyal ba thams cad kyi ring bsrel kye za ma tog ces bya ba rdzogs s+ho// / 6// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma aSh+Ta sha ta
180b5(rgyud): bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// shin du dang pa'i sems kyis su// thub la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te
180b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags pa yi// mtshan rnams 'dir ni brjod par bgyi// gzugs mdzes gzugs dang ldan pa ste// gzugs rnams kun gyi bla na med// mtshan rnams thams cad kun du
180b7(rgyud): rdzogs// 'jas dpal dpal mi dam pa lags// bsam gyis mi khyab bsam dang brag ma cu rtsal bsam yas rmad du byung // sku gsung phrin las bsam mi khyab// de bzhin zhugs kyang bsas mi khyab// spyong nyid bzhi
180b8(rgyud): 'i bdag nyid can/ stong pa'i chos dang yang dag ldan// stong pa nyid la lhag par moso// srid pa gsum po stong bar ston/ thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad ga zigs// sa rnams kun gyi bdag dang
181a1(rgyud): no// sems can gyi mchog tu tur// sems can kun kya phyags kyis gnangan 'gro cu da de zhon du/  tshon ma mams cing 'jams// pas ra gcod ga
181a2(rgyud): seng ge mi yi mchog/ dung ning nyon mongs nams kyi drim thun mi mngal// sems can thams cad grangs sroka/ khrol zhing 'jig rten mol mdzad pa// ral ba sun rdzo brtul zhugs can// tshangs pa tshangs
181a3(rgyud): pa'i gnas na bzhugs// badrang nor thogs shing phyag la bar bsnams// dag cing dag pa rnams dgas 'a na pa'i dbyang sa can mang 'a dbang ma de// pad ma las 'grangs pad ma'i spyan// pad ma'i re ba
181a4(rgyud): // bzhugs pa'i gdan khri pad ma lags// gtsang ma ud pa'i sngon po bsnams// bas ma dag ni ba'i thugs dang ldan// khyon sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas// khyod ni dang po'i sangs rgyas lags/ 
181a5(rgyud): yul ldan 'ang mnga' dbang brnyes// bden pa bzhi dag ston pa'o// 'jig rten byi basbyi stong ma ngang khyon didang drug skyed bu'i bdan khyo na ni pa'i sems can nas gdun gyi mda' bde ni 'o tan gan khyod ni bu mchog byed bur/ 
181a6(rgyud): byed bzhin byer sa shongs/ rnam par 'dren dang 'dul mdzad pa// rgyal sras rgyal ba nyid las 'khrungs// 'od zer skyong ldan gyi mgyod// zla ba dang ni phur bu'ang kyod// rnam thos bu dang chu lha'ang la gas/ 
181a7(rgyud): na thA/  sa sa grus spyong// de ma na byed po na kyad gas bathogs pa du ma//  ma dug par ga pa ga she pa 'a
181a8(rgyud): rnams kun gyis phyag bgyis pa// 'jig rten chos kyi dri ma bral/ khyod na 'jig rten gang bag mchog/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa'i jig rten rig ye shes can gyi dam mchog pa// dam pa sbyin dang gan
181b1(rgyud): / dud kyilas kyis maung ma//  ga kya na /  // com ldan na N+Di sa
181b2(rgyud): nga ldan zhing mkhas pa lags// khyod ni bsod nams dpag bsam sha // byang chub yan lag me tog brgya na// na ya la 'bras bu phun sum chags// lus can kun gyi mchog tu gyur// yid du 'ong zhing yid
181b3(rgyud): 'phrog pa// sdig pa mi mnga' tshangs par spyod// khyod ni mjug rings gapa' mchog lags// khyod ni drab srong chub pa mchog/ khyon ni rgyal tshab dbang bskur ba// sa bcu'i mda' bdag gtso bo lags// ded dpon
181b4(rgyud): 'gro ba rnams kyi ga no// mya ngan 'das pa mchog ston bzhin// khyod ni nam mkha' sa chu bzhin// khyod ni me dang rlung lca bu// khyod ni yid bzhin nor bu ltar// sems can po bkun rdzogs mdzad// 'byung po kun gyi
181b5(rgyud): ga gyis pa/ rin chen kyong la phyag 'tshal lo// 'dam dpal gyis ni bka' stsal pa// m-i hA kye daM namaHswA hA/ ra nad smos pa'i mtshan rnams dang // rig sngags bcas par 'dzin na ni// sdig 'gyur rnam dag/ 
181b6(rgyud): rab tu thob// rgyams rtsa brgyad lhag pa'i mtshan// skyes bu dus gsum su thog pa// de 'dod pas ma bu meng bzhin du/ gagadon mi za par 'grub par 'gyur// babang po'i mtshan nams dan na ni/ mtshams can
181b7(rgyud): skal pa mnyam pa li// las rnams mi bzad gang byas pa// de dag thams cad mur du byung // 'jig rten pa rol 'phob dang // 'jigs pa chen po'i byung ba'i tshe// sems can dag pas dran byam na// 'jam pa'i
181b8(rgyud): dbyings kyang thob par 'phrus smod padran pas can byas te// nges par gnas nas su klog sa// sangs rgyas nyid ni dod na yang // thob 'gyur 'di khri ches med// 'phags pa rang ma dpal kyi mtshan brgya rtsa
182a1(rgyud): nga mdzin da / mngon gyi namat+tAr /  dang/ 'phags pabyams papadam panas bzhes lnga ga ngas/ ri ni mchog sa sum la phyag 'tshal / 
182a2(rgyud): tshul byams pas byag 'tshamag/ ma can ma ga rtog ma/  chen kyi sa kyi kyi phyags rba sta ga 6/ oMm gyi mi / ma na dzi ma la ky-i / 
182a3(rgyud): mahA sa ma ya sid d+he/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ mahA bo d+hi/ marba bI do// slar s+pha ra/ asma kAng sa ma ya bo d+hi bo d+hi/ ma hA bo d+hi swA hA/ rtsa ba'i gsang sngags so// mi ma he moH/ mahA mo he swAhA/ snying po'o// oM mu ni mu ni pA hA/ nye ba'i snying
182a4(rgyud): gzungs 'di can pa tsam dang / klog pa dang // ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la sems pa dang / bsgom pa ma gyis gang gi tshe bdag blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs
182a5(rgyud): par gyur pa na/ bdag gis sems can de nges par btsal bar bgyi ste// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du lung bstan par bgyi'o// tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa'i ri dwags dang / bya rnams kyi
182a6(rgyud): du sgrogs par byed na/ de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa 'thob po// 'di thos pa tsam gyis nam du yang ngan song du co 'dzu'o/ mang da ma pa minas soma'i rangal du yang mi
182a7(rgyud): lha'i bskal pa stong du 'khor los bskur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// dge ba 'u'i las kyi lam dang ldan par 'gyur ro// ji ltar bsams shing don du gnyer ba'i longs spyod 'grub par 'gyur ro// bcom 'angs bdag gi
182a8(rgyud): kyang sems can de baspyad par mi ba gyi lags so// nges par bdag byang chub kyi snying po la mchis nas/ de ji ltar gyur kyang rung bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par bgyi'o// 'pha
182b1(rgyud): mas dpa sa nas bya 'og zungs rdzogs s+ho/ rgya ma na 'a kyang /  zhes ra sa 'a du nas pa sa// ga du/ A
182b2(rgyud): la nA ma aSh+Ta sha ta ka/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gnod 'dzin gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa n+de phyag/ 'phags pa gnod 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas gnod sbyid 'brog gnas po// gser dag gis ni legs par bam ma// 
182b3(rgyud): kyis ni ba 'dzes shing // me ni shing du 'bar 'drag// lcang lo con du zhugs nas kyang // gisang bdag rdo rje 'chang ba yi// zhabs gnyis la ni ba 'jus nas// shin tu mnyam bzhag dris pa ni// bcom ldan gnod 'dzin rgyas
182b4(rgyud): dbang po// gsang sngags tshogs ni kun gyi bdag/ rig sngags 'chang rnams kun gyis mchod// lha dang lha min phyag byas pa// ma rungs 'dul ba brtson pa po// byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan ldan// mgon po sems
182b5(rgyud): na kun don mdzad// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba 'dzin// sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas// snying rjes non pa'i yid kyis su// yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub phyir// bdag gis kyang ni sems bskyed de// mi rnams
182b6(rgyud): ni ThAng+ra ba dang // bsod nams chung zhing dang chung ba/ song nas sdug bsngal chen po yis// rabadu gzicir togasang pa'i bdag/ de nas gnod 'dzin gyis smras nas// bcom ldan gsang ba gas bi'i bdag/ snying rjes nor te
182b7(rgyud): / blas pa ni// legs par nyon cig gsang ba po// mgon po gnod 'dzin dpal dang ldan// sems can kun gyi don byed pa// dngul ba'i nyon mongs sel ba po// nor ro cag gi dbang phyug gi/ mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad
182b8(rgyud): sod nams ldan// dbul pa'i nyes sdigs la byed pa// gang gA'i bye ma'i grangs snyed kyis// rgyal mchog rnams kyis sngon gsungs pa// 'od zer brgya lanas pa yi// gang na sangs rgyas nyi ma'i zhal// rdzob
183a1(rgyud): na pags ca// don dugs sngo // das pa sam ma da ma ldam/ na dag ga shes rabs// sems can kun don dzin pag/ ma tshogs par ba gyud pa / 
183a2(rgyud): mnyam gsas rab tu nyon// 'phags pa lha dang lha min tha// shes rab ldan nying chos la gus// snying brtse'i bdag nyid bzod ldan brtan// dbang po ni dbang po thul// dge bras sdig 'a roms shes
183a3(rgyud): can// des shing don kun sgrub pa po// mi gnod mi sru dpal dang ldan// mdod bdag gzhan gyis mi thub pa// dkon mchog gsum gyi skyabs gcig pu// sangs rgyas kun gyis gzigs pa po// der rnams
183a4(rgyud): bgazi brjid can// rtag sbyin nor ni 'phel byed pa// rin chen thung gnas skye bo 'dul// chu mi bdag po chu 'bebs pa// gnod sbyin chu spyod bdag nyid can// gter don nye ba skyon pa po// gser gyi ri
183a5(rgyud): ste// dbul pa'i gdon las thar byed pa// dbang po nyid bang 'gro ba'i mgon// chu yi dbang po sprini mdog can// 'jig rten mig dang 'jig rten b+ha// nyi ma tha zer drug pa// ne chen rgyal po chen po ste// lag
183a6(rgyud): rab gnas pa// gzhon nu meng ge tog can te// gnod sbyin chen po rdzu 'phrul che// tshig gi bdag po bzhin 'dzum pa// gaslong por sman par sgrub po// bram ze 'dod pa'i lcags kyu ste// che bdon grub grub pas
183a7(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang ba 'khor los sgyur/ sa dang mi lda non// bum pa'i lho can mig yangs pa// lha yi dri ldan 'di ltar mgyogs/ khyab bdag pade byung nor ba ca grus// sems can rnams ni stsob
183a8(rgyud): 'dod dpung bskur gzugs yid kyi lha// cod pan can te rigs dga' bkag yon phyogs cod pan lag na dbyug/ lag pa brgya pa stobs po // sa brgyad dbang phyug lha yul ba// zla ba nya ba'i
183b1(rgyud): // de dpon tshogs kyi bdag pa s+ho// gnas na tshong po skal ba~M tsong gau/ yod pats+tshin+da no bu brim pa ba~M tha~Mng // dpagasas ma na shing mi la bdag/ mchog don sa pa~M gaun Ta s+t+wa~M// mchog sbyin ma'u
183b2(rgyud): 'dujug pa// skyabs 'os bab shis srung ba po// rin che phreng bas rnam par brgyan// lha yi seng ge'i khri la bzhugs// byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi bdag/ rab du da rab nor mi zad// seng ge'i rtsal gyi micu rtsal
183b3(rgyud): ston pa 'jig rten gsum las rgyal// gtso bo tshor ba rigs kyi mchog/ pad ma'i lte ba thub med rgyal// tshangs par spyod pa rgya mtsho che// gnod 'dzi bdag nyid che ba yi// ming brgya rtsa brgya dngas bshad 'di// sdig pa
183b4(rgyud): thams cad 'joms byed cing // dbul ba'i nyon mongs sel byed pa// 'byor dang skal bzang skyed pa po// glang po rta nor 'phel byed pa// gara' dang rgyu skar rmi lam ngan// ltas ngan sel bar byed pa ste// rags
183b5(rgyud): sam gal te grong dang ni// dur khrod yang na ri yang rung // mkhas pa gang na klog pa der// g.yul dong dkra ni nyam nga ba// sbrul dang me chu chom rkun sogs// stag dang dom dang 'jigs pa che// rgya mtsho 'grong dga' mi bzang
183b6(rgyud): lal// mi ni rab tu ni bar 'gyur// dbang po medang chu lha dang // gshin rje srin bdag rlung lha dang // nor sbyin dpal ldan ku bai rA// nor bu bzang sras lnga rtsen dang / cing tshon dang thog gnas dang // lha dang gnad kyi
183b7(rgyud): dag kyang // g.yel ba med par nyin mtshan du// rab tu dgang bzhin srung bar byed// gang na sti dro'i diklog pa der// glang chen tu drang b.lang dang //  chog rnam pa sna tshogs dang // 'bras bu me tog rnams
183b8(rgyud): 'pheg// in da ni ga pa'i dang // gdod pa kun pa sa byung ba rnams// thams cad du ni pa legs 'gyur // lhag par byis pa rnams la shis// de la'i drugs kyu rnams dang // ma dang dad ma
184a1(rgyud): dang// ma 'a byed//  ga grol// da na 'di nang nar dang ldan// dag na che bo dang // dpal dang gtong ba
184a2(rgyud): rmas// rigs mchog rgyal ba 'byung ba dang // longs spyod chen po'i nang du ste// tshe dang dpal dang ldan pa dang // nad med rims dang bral bar 'gyur// tshe rabs kun du skye ba dran// lobs skyen thos pa
184a3(rgyud): 'dzin pa dang // byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan ldan// skal pa bzang po nyid tu 'gyur// phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal gnod sbyin rje// gsang bdag khyod la phyag 'tshal to// ma rungs 'dul la brtson pa
184a4(rgyud): lag na rdo rje khyod la 'dud// sems can dang la mnyen gshin pa// nor bzang sras kyi grags pa 'di// dbul ba'i nad ni zhi byed pa// rab tu bshad pa legs par gsungs// don kun grub pa gsang ba'i
184a5(rgyud): bdags kyang ni 'dir dbul te// de ni legs par dran tsam gyis// mi ni dbul las grol 'gyur zhing // gzhan gyis chi tshugs srung bar 'gyur// dgra rnams kyis kyang mi choms shing // skal ba bzang dang skal
184a6(rgyud): ldan// longam yang ni 'tsho bar 'gyur// lha yi glang po rin chen dang // rgyal dang rgyal srid 'os rnams kyang // nges par myur du thob 'gyur te// rgyal srid kyang ni the tshom med// na mo rAhA tra yA ya/ na mo ma NiH
184a7(rgyud): ga ma hA ya k+Sha se rA ba ta me/ oM dza'i ma hriM gro// de babyar da nog pa ri sha na a ta b+ha ga de ba lak+Sha sa ma la ma nu s+pha ra d+hi hU~M phaT swA hA/ 'phags pa gnod 'dzin gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs s+ho// 
184a8(rgyud): rgyag skad nga / ma sa ldang bu than rAm mi sru / bod skad du/ mdotshan po 'dus pa chen po'i mdo zhes bya ba/ dgon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom
184b1(rgyud): sa shA ma rgya ga na rus ga za pa dag tu ga byed pa khyab ga/ 'ang po ga bdag gdon du pa// thod ba
184b2(rgyud): da pa da pa mas sems ni sunas pa 'oyong brtan da ba ga sa pa na dus 'anasas dge slong ga s+yAd du ldan 'das pa dang rnana'i chos kyi gargyam ston par sbe
184b3(rgyud): de'i tshe ni phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag nas/ dbang che bar grags pa dbang che bar grags pa'i lha dag lhags nas// bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la brten bkur byed do// de nas tshangs rig
184b4(rgyud): sku tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gnas pa bzhi zhig 'di snyam du sems rkyen sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ni shAkya rnams kyi sor spyi'i gnas kyi nags chel na/ dge slong lnga bcu thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa phag pa zang ba/ bya
184b5(rgyud): byed pa byas pa/ khung bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa// srid par kun du song ba yongs du bang ba/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan pa
184b6(rgyud): dge slong gi/ dge 'dun la mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi gtam ston par mdzad de/ de'i tshen phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag nas dbang che bar lags pa dbang che bar grags pa'i rna
184b7(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed kyis bdag cag kyang songs/ bcom ldan 'das la re re nas tshigs su bcad bas mngon par spyod par bya gor mchag snyam mo// de nas tshangs ri
184b8(rgyud): rin po dag 'dis ste/ dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldanabs lags bsum pa las brkyang ba'am/ brkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas mi snang bar gyur cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
185a1(rgyud): tu rgyonas gcig la rlonas ca ni cig nas chags sus cad dag pa log 'das pa sa gnos pa 'i//  tshogs kun nas lcags kur bas// gzhan gyis mthub dag
185a2(rgyud): blta ba'i slad du bdag cag mchis// tshangs ris kyi lha gnyis pas tshigs su bcad de gsol ba// drang por gyur ba'i sems kyis ni// 'di na dge slong rab brtson pa// kha lo bltar mig blangs shing // dbang po rnams
185a3(rgyud): sngom bgyid// tshangs ris kyi lha gsum pas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// dbang phung 'ong ba 'obs lwa pa'i// bya rab bcom 'gring mi tshugs// de dag sred bral dag spyod cing // 'dren pas glang po gzhon ltar btul/ 
185a4(rgyud): si de skad ces gsol nas de nyid nangag bcu ma skyel yod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i 'khor thams cad la rnam par gzigs nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag kye ma lha rnams kyi 'dus pa 'di
185a5(rgyud): ni che ba yin no// dge slong dag rtse ma lha rnams kyi 'dus pa 'di ni shin tu che ba yin te// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'dal ba'i dus na byung bar gyur pa'i
185a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la yang 'di lta ste/ dper nad ltar nga'i lha rnams kyi 'dus pa chen po 'di kho na lta bu dag 'dus par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
185a7(rgyud): tus gang dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'thung bar 'gyur ba'i bangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la yang 'di lta ste/ dbang dad sa dnga'i lha rnams kyi 'dus pa chen po 'dayon tu bu dag 'du bar 'gyur ro// dge
185b1(rgyud): da nam kyi ma dag spod par byas nyanas kyi m-i ga su nag/  gas gnas 'du/  brjod gan au//  /  du// mas pasngos mnyam ga byas shing / 
185b2(rgyud): kun nas 'dus par gyur pa ni// bu dag zing nas byed pa yin// gang dgas la gnas pa dang // gang dag ri khrod gnas pa rnams// seng ge bzhin du ba dang la// sems bsdus mnyam par ga zhag byas shing // kun nas 'dus skur
185b3(rgyud): khing zhes// byed pa bdag gis brjod par bya// yid byed dag cing rab dang la// rnyog med 'chi bdag spangs pa rnams// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten mthar thug pa'i// lha dang ni yi bar na 'khod// slob ma sna brgya phrag gnyis
185b4(rgyud): dang // gzhan yang brgya dang bcu dag dang // stong phrag du ma rnam ngag gi/ lha rnams 'dus par gyur pa dag// maH na se mtha' ma mi mthong 'di // phyogs rnams thams cad kyab gyur ba// sangs rgyas kyis ni de sakhyen nas// de
185b5(rgyud): shegs pas rnams gzigs te/ de nas stod pas bstan dka' ba'i// nyan thos rnams la dge slong dag/ sna tshogs 'don pang lhags kar gyis// nges par rtogs shes bka' stsal ba// tshigs su bcad pas macar chags kyi/ 
185b6(rgyud): dmas kyimi brjod kyis// rtse gcig kur ba'o yid kyis ni// nga yis shad pa mnyan par kyis// sang legs kyi nags rgyal gyi// gnongs song phrag ra po dag// se mya gnas kyi nags tshal ri/ 
185b7(rgyud): padang // gang dka de 'i 'khor ram dang // dag kyang ni 'dus par lags// rdzu 'phrul ldan rlung 'ong dong ldan// kha dog ldam ring chags pa dmas// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal da // 'das pa'i tshul du ngon nga grags
185b8(rgyud): ga drug so//  dpa /  kyi mag rgyal ro// snang ba rgyas kyi 'khong pa dang // gang gang pa po rnams dang // ded kyang me pa
186a1(rgyud): ni yong pa ldan// dag ldan da lags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams sa phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i rdul du mngon pa zhugs// shar phyogasanam rgya rgyas kyi ni// demanyam nga phrag gdu/ 
186a2(rgyud): yod// sed skye gnas kyi nag ma tsha ni// rdza sa rgyas kyi 'khod pa dag // gang dag de 'i lasor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus pa rtags// dru phrul ldan di do dpa rngan// bdag dram ni khams ra
186a3(rgyud): rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshul du mngon par zhugs// de ltar stong phrag bcu drug kun// kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dang // ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni// snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang / 
186a4(rgyud): gang dag de 'i 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// bdog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshul du mngon par zhugs// 
186a5(rgyud): gnod sbyin chu srin rgyal po'i khab// yangs pal ni rtag gnas shing // brgya stong phrag ni mang po yi// gnod sbyin bsnyen bkur byed pa dang // gang gde yi 'khor rnams dang // de yang 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs// rdzu 'phrul
186a6(rgyud): / naning 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// kun gyi bshes gnyen lnga brgya dang // rdzu 'phrul chen po kun gyi lha/ 
186a7(rgyud): gang dag de 'i 'khor rnams dang // de gnyis kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhidi 'dro dang ldan// bdog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/  dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par/ 
186a8(rgyud): zhugs// shar phyogs mngon par spyod byed pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni// dri ri'i bdag po rgyal ba ste// ming ni yul 'khor sru des bya// de ni nye du lhan cig tu// glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse// gang
186b1(rgyud): da 'ayor rnams dang // de la 'dus pa'i mang du 'ongs// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'do ldan// bdog ldadu nang grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyan 'tshal nag// 'dus pa'i tshal du ngan par zhugs// 
186b2(rgyud): ni mang yod de// brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig/ de dag ming 'thun grags pa ni// dbang po nos bya spobs po che// lha dang lha min ka sprul 'gyod par// kun duganan gyis mi thub par// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / 
186b3(rgyud): kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan ning 'ad dang ldan// bdog ldan ni chags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// lho phyogs mngon par skyed bye
186b4(rgyud): rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni// rdul bum bdag po rgyal po ste// ming ni 'phags skyes pa nas bgyi// de ni nye du lhan cig tu// klu dang gar gyis rtag cu rtse// gang dag/ de yi 'khor rnams dang // de yang 'dus pa'i nang
186b5(rgyud): du'ongs// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan la dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par thugs/ de la bu ni ma pa zod // rgyang cu dang ni bcu dang
186b6(rgyud): de dag ming 'thud grags pa ni// dbang po zhes pagyi stobs po che// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pam// kun du gzhan gyis mi thub pa// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phru
186b7(rgyud): 'di 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// nub phyogs mngon par skyong byed pa// rgyal chen grags dang
186b8(rgyud): / kA li bdag po rgyal po ste// ming ni mig mi bapa' zhes bgyi// de ni nye rgyad cig tu// klu dang chags kyis rtag du rtsen/ yang dag de yi la bar rnams dang // do yang 'dus pa'i rang du 'ongs// rdul
187a1(rgyud): nanang 'ad dang ldan// bdag na rdzogs ldan rnams// dgas rnams la byad 'tshal zhing // dus pa tshal dusan zhugs// 'dun mang med do// brgyad cu nga na su da gcig
187a2(rgyud): ming 'thun chags pa ni// dbang po nas bkyi ska bas po che// sgra dang lha min ga/ tshul bye bye // kun du gnan gyis mi thub pa// gang ga de mi 'bo rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags//  la ldan
187a3(rgyud): ldan// khadog ldan ning grags ldan rnams// dge song rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// byang phyogs mngon par spyod byed pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni// gnod sbyin padas
187a4(rgyud): // me ni lus den yonas bya// don du lhan cigaH// klud dgar kyis rtag tu tse// gang dag de 'i 'khor rnams dang // de yang 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs// rdzu 'phrul lda zhing 'ad dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing zags ldan rnam
187a5(rgyud): slong mas la phyag 'tshal ning// 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon pa zhugs// de labuM ni mang yod de// byad cu dang ni lung gcig dag mi rdzun pags pa ni// bang po nas bya snyams paH// sgra ba rnami cig
187a6(rgyud): / 'gyed par// kun du gzhan gyis mi thub pa// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing zags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag
187a7(rgyud): 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal nga mngon par zhugs// shad phyogs ni ni yul lakhor srung //  phyogs na ni 'alags skyes pa// nu'i phyogs na ni mig mi ba za / byed phyogs na ni lus rin go// rgyal po chen pod
187a8(rgyud): 'jig rten skyong 'grags da na/ rngubaphrul chen po stabs tshonan phyogs 'azhi dag ni myong bar byed// gang dag de 'i 'phor rnams dang // dedag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'gyu ldan ni 'dod pan/ 
187b1(rgyud): dan na sa na /  mas byan napa/  na da nan rnams/  nyon ma la gan ma //  pa sus//

187b4(rgyud): de skyed bu'i bdag/ dang brdzudan can dun 'dod gcongad pa/ yin da na dang nam thu la nges dngo// slobs ldan nong ma spyod de/  dang nye tha dang/ rin rgyamags can gang yod// marje dang na yon camad// na
187b5(rgyud): ngo'abrog gnas dang // rgyal ba'i klu mchog mi rgyal po// dri ba sna tshogs sde dang ni// lcags mdung ring dang ma ldan dang // tshigs lnga ser ze med dga' dang // gnod sbyin ring po'i gro dang bcas 'bras bu gsum dang mgul gsum po// 'gro
187b6(rgyud): snyed yod pa yin// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // da dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// 'dog ldan zhing chags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon

187b8(rgyud): 'jigs byed che dngas srung // rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i gru yang thongs// dang dag de 'i 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrus ldan zhing 'dod paldan// khadog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dges
188a1(rgyud): ni/ dus tsham dus nam zugs nga rgya la man na rtabs ma dzin chags bya/ san das 'grol yang / ma b.las kyis du mngon pa pa sa bu rgyal mi 'gas phyin
188a2(rgyud): 'dab ba par ba mdzad cing / gsung 'jam brjod pa de nyid 'anasangs rgyas skyabadu nye bar song// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / de yang 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs/ rdzu 'phrul ldan ning 'od dung ldan 'dog ldan zhing thags ldan rnams/ dag
188a3(rgyud): daphyag 'tshal zhing / 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// lag rdo rjes lam byas shing // rgya mtshor brten pa'i lha mi ni rnams thams cad nor ltas skrag gyur cing // mcho la skyabs su 'du shes pa// zugs bzang ris dpa
188a4(rgyud): ba 'i khyed dang btang thung dang // stobs ldan bu ni rgyal po sam// rnam snang byed pa'i bu rnams dang // stobs ldan sde dang skragacan pa'ang// pal chen gyod kyi dus lags shes/ dge slong 'dus pa'i nags tshal du/ 
188a5(rgyud): tirtags pa dang // gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// khadog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / 'dus pa'i tshal
188a6(rgyud): sugs su smra mdong bu mo dang blang mo nga phyi bzhi 'ongs mnga' ba shes ma dang chus tsam grags ldan nyid kyang 'ongs zhes dang chu dang rung shi dang / me yi sa mo'ang ngo gyur te/ bcu tshan tshogs bcu de dag kum/ khados
188a7(rgyud): seM rgya'i gnas kyi sa rgyal ni/ ldang bar byas te la'od pa dang gang dag po'i bor rnams dang / dag ni 'dus par gas bu phrul ldan ning 'od dang ldang// dag ldan zhing thags ldan rnams / dge 'a ma
188a8(rgyud): tshal ni/ dus pa'i tshem du mngon pa rba/ bya jug lha dang gzhol tsam ya mtshem gnyis kyang lhags par zur/  la gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis// ba nyid ni mdun du 'dang// nyim gnas pa'i skarnams kyis nyi nyi
188b1(rgyud): 'a sa pa byed ba /  mas kyis shes/ mas da nga ga gas na 'angs na 'du gas rgya
188b2(rgyud): gas tshal ni// snang 'a byas te 'khor pa dang // gang dag de 'i 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan ning 'od dang ldan// bdog ldan 'ang thags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la
188b3(rgyud): tshal zhing / 'dus pa'i tshul du mngon pa pa zhugs// skam tshogs can ma dang ni/ me m+bu'i rtse 'dra 'jigs na/ zhi ba ni dang dge bzlogs//  rkyeg zhes pan 'odas gyur cing // rlubasod nga mtshan mchings parang
188b4(rgyud): med rnam pa dag/ gang nig phyogs su char 'bebs pa 'ad 'i dbyangs canam yang 'ongs// cu tshan tshogs su da ban// bdog pa tshogs ldan bangadag se skye'i gnas kyi nags tshalani// snang bar
188b5(rgyud): 'khod pa dang / gang ga de 'i 'khod rnams dang / dedag kyang ni 'dus par rtags// rdzu yul ldan ning rjod // kha dog ldan ni grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams po phyag 'tsha zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal
188b6(rgyud): grags/ thosangs rdzob sangs chen modang / si 'ang mi 'dra dam pa dang// khye mos myos dang de bzhin du// di khrug sa yang 'ongs kyar cing // phag mo zag mo chen mong nga // song mangs ma ldan cigasag
188b7(rgyud): na tshogs bcu de dag kun// bdag sna tshogs ldan pa dag/ seng skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni// ldang bar byas te 'khod pa dang / gang dag de la 'khor rnams dang / dag kyang ni 'dus par lags/ 
188b8(rgyud): dod sa// da sunani thugs rten rnams// dge slong rnams so phyag 'tshal zhing// 'dus pa'i tshil du mngon par zhugs// ga yo rgya byed ci dang /  'dza mo yang
189a1(rgyud): / ba dang // gas ser mo yang 'ongs par gyur// 'phrog ma rtag tu myos pa dang // srel ma rnams pa du ma dang // dag pa dang ni 'od can ma// lha mo grags ldan rnams kyang lhags// bcu tshan chog
189a2(rgyud): dedag sun// ba dog sna tshogs ldan padag/ ser gyi'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni// snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang // gang dag de 'i 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par skyugs// rdzu 'phrul ldan ni
189a3(rgyud): ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ pade byed dga' ldan 'thab bral dang // nag pos btab pa du ma dang // suma'i di dang / 
189a4(rgyud): luba'i mchog/ slar ma zhes bya legs slod dang // 'phrul dga' rnams dang de bzhin du// dbang bsgyur rnams kyang lhags par gyur// bcu chen tshogs bcu de dag kur// kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag
189a5(rgyud): ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni// snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang // gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan
189a6(rgyud): rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// lha tshogs drug cu de dag kun// kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag/ ser skya'i gnas kyi nags che la ni// snang bar byas
189a7(rgyud): pa dang // gang dag de 'i la khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// khadog lngar zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par
189a8(rgyud): sa/ ngas pa 'dzin rted kyang dag / ngas 'i/ bya//  med gnod duskyer rgyas de// sas skyed dbang smrag // du phrus ya da/ sa/ rgyan ci 'phrog
189b1(rgyud): dus pa/ da byar rtags// rdu 'dul ldadzin 'a ma 'ag da nga da ga/  la na/ 
189b2(rgyud): thugs/  byed pa 'groms so// dog gzugs na 'das me// rnarnams ldan bya nan das/ nga na kyil rnamapa dang /

189b4(rgyud): dbang por bcas dang dbang ldan bcas// skye dgu'i bdag dang bcas pa yi// lharnams de dag der lhags shing // dge slong rnams kyang der lhags so// nan pos smras pa'i tshig la ltos// 'dod chags kyi seMn

195b1(rgyud): bu cang shes khyod la 'dud// skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes// mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni// rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags// bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol// khyod la mim
195b2(rgyud): phyag 'tshal ba// de skad yang deng yang du thos// de srad bdag ni 'di skad ces// 'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig/ gau ta ma rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig na sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa// mya ngan 'das la
195b3(rgyud): 'thol mchi// de ltar nub kyi phyogs de ni// babang ba lags shes sde lo ri// phyogs de mngon par skyong 'gyid cing // rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags// gang na byang gi sgra mi snyen// dga' zhing l+h+wam
195b4(rgyud): lha mdzes dang // gang na mi rnams tshol mi bcu phrag bcu pa sgye'u zhing/ de dag mthom 'di bas la// shol yang 'cha' bar mi bgyid cing / 
195b5(rgyud): duldan pa dang / dri bda' me tog tshogs 'ang zhing // lha yi bdud rtsi 'dra ba 'tshal// na li ker bskol bgyis nas// tshong mar de 'tshal sran chod min// ga dme lce'i rtse 'dra ba'i// slar dag 'khrungs par 'gyu
195b6(rgyud): // phyogs de mngon par skyong ba rjid pa// rgyal chen thags dang ldan du ni// gnod mini bdag po rgyal pha// ming ni lus ngam po nas bgyi// do ni nyid du lhan cig tu// klung ga kyis rtag tu rtse/ 
195b7(rgyud): ni rnams kyis yongs bskor cing // nod sbyi rnams kyis mdun gyis bsas// de labu ni ma mchis te// da cu dang ni bcu dang gcig/ de dag mir brdzun grags pa ni// dbang po dang zhes
196a1(rgyud): stobs paca// lha dang rnamin gzul 'byed pa/ kun du zhan gyis mi thub lags// de ga rnams kyi chag sa sangs rgyas// sangam rgyas kyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas/ sa shes kya
196a2(rgyud): chon myong sa phyag 'chi sa kyig kyis kya /  nas phyag la gas/ yA dge bal gzigs sunasog/ da / 
196a3(rgyud): de skad yad dang yang du thos// de skad bdag ni 'di skad ces// 'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig/ gau ta ma rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig/ sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa// mya ngan 'das la phya
196a4(rgyud): mchi// de ltar byang gi phyogs de ni// bzang nga lags shes skye bo mchi// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags// shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung // lho phyogs na
196a5(rgyud): 'phags skyes po// nub phyogs na ni mig mi ba'ang // kyang phyogs na ni lus ngan po// rgyal po chen po da ni dag/ 'jig rten skyong 'grags dang ldan// rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs po che// phyogs
196a6(rgyud): dag ni myong bar bgyid// rgyal po dag gi mngag gzhug pa// gnod sbyin 'dod dgur mchi ba rnams// de dgazang potsho 'tshal ning// phyogs phyogs rag tu rnam par // de dag ni tshigs d+hadang / 
196a7(rgyud): dmo dang / khyu mchog dang / ma he dang / ra dang / lug dang / sprul dang / bya dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / gzhon nu dang / gzhon nu ma la 'tshal zhing phyogs phyogs dag tu yang ma che lags pa/ 
196a8(rgyud): kha cig gis shing rta dngas shing phyogs phyogs dag tu yang mchi lags so// chibs te dang / ra mo dang / gya mchog dang / ma he dang / radang / lug dang / sprul dang / bya dang / skyes pa dang / phung medang
196b1(rgyud): du / bcon num gtsug gsan tu rangs shing phyags phyogs ngag tu la gso// rdzu 'phru chen pa ste zas pa tsho'o// gnod sbyin 'dod dkur mam ba rnams// bzhon pa de dag 'tshal nas ni// phyogs
196b2(rgyud): ni dag ni skyong bar bgyid// rgyal po dag ni grong khyer dag/ sna tshogs mkha' la chub mchis 'di lta ste/ kun du rgyu ba dang / kun du chu'am lags pa dang / sa la kun du sgrub ma lags pa dang // gang bcas sa steng kun tu chu
196b3(rgyud): bdang / sbubs can dang grong khyer sbubs can zhes bgyi bdag lags so// byang phyogs na mcho bka 'i bang ga zhes bgyi ba yang mchis lags so// nub phyogs nathong khyer sar pa gser ldan dang / gos can dang
196b4(rgyud): gos mchog can dang pad ma can/ bad ma bzang po can dang / sa gzhi can zhes bgyi bdag kyang mchis lags so// chab rgyun mang po'i gnas nyung ba// 'dzin pa zhes bgyi'i mtsho mchis te/ cha btsun tha dad de las byung/ 
196b5(rgyud): de las dgung char babab par 'gyur// btsun pa grod kyir u shwa ra'i sbubs kyi pha rol ma/ lus gnas dang ni gnas yangs dang / de bas gnas yang rgun lugs can// rgyun lugs mang dang de bas mang // bar snang
196b6(rgyud): mtha' la bya ltar gda'// btsun pa grong khyer sbubs can gyi pha rol byang phyogs na mdun sa bya gar can zhe bgyi ba de mchis te/ der ni gnod sbyin rnams 'du zhing gnas lags so// rkang mi sdug la mchu 'phyangs
196b7(rgyud): dang // 'arigs su s+ho thu can dag mchis// don sngon shing 'bras bu rtogs// mabya krung chung sgra sman dang // ba thugs skad chen po// gang shing de'u dag spa' byin cing // mabya rnams kyi sde dag kyang / 
196b8(rgyud): ma b+ha dang chun lag dang // bya rnams sna tshogs skad 'byin cing // me tog sbrang rtsi'i rol dga'// lus ngan pong kru gar gyis// pad ma can dang lhan cig rtse/ btsun pa grong khyer lung lo can
197a1(rgyud): sa pa 'dzin da mas lags// dag chi pa mthun pa de ni zhu mchog cananas / bdunan mngon ma kyi nas na
197a2(rgyud): delags sngags kyi tshig ni ring dag lags so// d+hanA/  ma ming mi 'i/ kau mu 9/ ti'i ki dri mu / rA ru me/ trai dun /  / gan hU~M/ ga d+ha ni/ sog sog swA hA/ btsun pa bcom la
197a3(rgyud): 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis dri za rnams dang / dri za chen po rnams dang / dri ba'i sde dpon rnams dang / dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bkyi lags so// 'di lta ste/ 'dod myos dga' bas bya
197a4(rgyud): dang // klu li mi myos bsrun dang ni// phreng bas myos dang sbrad rtsis myos// me tog myos bsrun rnams dang / rtag tu myos dang dpal gyis myos// nod kyi myos dang dga' byed dang // ud pal pa mazla ba dang / 
197a5(rgyud): dzin ni 'azugs// d+ha Ta du dang gtsug lnga dang // gser spyod bu mo gseng can dang // pa bas pa dang lung bu dag/ 'grog nas dri srid rgyal po lags// de dag ni bdag gi spun lags te/ de dag la bdag
197a6(rgyud): za 'di ni bdag la 'tshe'o// dri za 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo nas mchi zhing de dag la go bar bgying lags so// bdag la 'tshe ba'i dri zla dang // bdag mi gtong ba'i dri za yis// legs par smras pa'i
197a7(rgyud): / a dza ka yi dog pa bzhin// de yi mgo tsha la bdun du 'gas// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so// tad+ya thA/ kun du le/ kun du la/ kud tu we 9 hi/ me hi/ a sa dA mad ti ka~M/ sar+b+baH
197a8(rgyud): ni/  du bya bar rtos teH/ tsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi tan po med ge slong dam/ dge slong sa 'ag/  dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen mgang la sa kun kyi sgru ba dang / kun du sgrub ma lags par
197b1(rgyud): 'am che ba'i ru lo'am/ ji ba'i bu mo 'am/ dri ba'i 'khor po'am/ dri ba'i 'khor mo'om/ dri ri'i mngag gzhug pa'am/ dri bi'amang la gzhug ma 'che bar 'byed pa grags lnga zhing grag 'tshol ba la la ni ga
197b2(rgyud): chi zhing / nye bar 'grer ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ dri za rnams kyi dri ba 'du ba'i nang du mcher mi rjod cing / rgyal po'i pho zang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob
197b3(rgyud): mgo adza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am// dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun du sgru ba dang kun
197b4(rgyud): ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo// rig sngags dang / bsrung ba dang / sug brkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyi bde la/ gal te sha ra'am/ sha za mo 'am/ sha
197b5(rgyud): 'am/ sha za rgan mo'am/ sha za'i bu pho'am/ sha ba'i bu mo'am/ shA za'i 'khor po'am/ sha za'i 'khor mo'am/ sha ba'i mngag gzhug pa 'am/ shA za'i mngag gzhug ma 'che bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhi
197b6(rgyud): 'chol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gur na grags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ sha za rnams kyi sha za 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing // rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo
197b7(rgyud): pang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo adzadza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so// tad+ya thA/ hu me hu me/ du me le/ pu mi la bA te ye swA hA
198a1(rgyud): na sa ba ga gas la pa rnams da tshum mchen po dmas dang / ma mas kyi rnams da / ga rnams kyi

198a4(rgyud): lags// de dag ni 'dag gi sman lags te/ de dkyil bdag sprul bam 'di ni mam mas bdag la 'tsho'o// chus ma 'di ni bdag mi cing ngon pa ma mi ning de dag la go bar brjid amaso/

198a7(rgyud): kun du chung ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdor ga sngags dang / bsrung ba dang / sdug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don pa bgyid ba des gal te grul bum 'am/ rdul
198a8(rgyud): bum mo'am/ rdul bum rgan po'am/ grul bum nan mo'am/ grul bum gyi phu phe'am/ grul bum gyi bu mo 'am/ grul bum gyi 'khor po'am/ grul bum gyi ri khor mo'am/ hrul bus kyi mang
198b1(rgyud): tsu pa ga nga du brtsod pakhrag/ nang man mas par gyur mthogs mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ rdul dur rna

200a1(rgyud): ris khor dang bcan/ nga bu gsum pa mgal gsum pa// 'phrog nas ji snyed mchis pa lags// de dag ni bdag gi spun lags rnyed dag la bdag gnod snyan 'di ni bdag la 'tshe'o// gan

200b8(rgyud): gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang ldan pa/ nam grong pa dang / ngagal ba der 'ong ba te phyi rnas pa'i zhabs la mgo los phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de'i tshe rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i kha dog ki mthus rgyal bu rgya
201a1(rgyud): khyim gang mkhyen pa// d+ha rnams kyis ni des 'tshal// dpa' chen kyed la phyag 'tsham lo// sangs rgyas dang ngan 'das pa dang // daltar byung dnga' khyen / sa ya 'i bdag phyag 'tshal/ khyod pa'ang bdag ci skyabs su ma'in/ 
201a2(rgyud): tsun la bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan pos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang dag gnas mal dgon pa dag dang / nag pa 'dab dag dang / bas mtha' dkar gnas bdag kyang mchis
201a3(rgyud): nodo sbyin dang mi ma lags pa gsug pa gtsug ma gnas pa gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par dad pa dag dang / mngan par ma dad pa dag kyang mchis te/ gnod sbyin dang yi ma lags pa gdug pa
201a4(rgyud): gtsug mar gnas pa gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par dad pa de dag ni shin du nyung la/ gnod sbyin dang / me ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag bcom ldan 'das
201a5(rgyud): gsung rab la ma mngon par ma ngan pa de dag ni ches mang lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong rnams dang / dge slong ma rnams dang / dge bsnyen rnams dang / dge bsnyen ma napas/ 
201a6(rgyud): 'di ltar bdag nyid bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba dang / gnod sbyin dang / mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar glanas pa mngon par ma dang pa dag mngon

214b1(rgyud): 'od sasbyin rnam pa dang / sangs rgyas kyin mad pa thams cad rna can tud ma ban rnams dang / mato de Sha ba bsngags pa thams cad ci ra shing rgyamatsho sbyin rnam pa dang /

215a1(rgyud): 'khor rgya che sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi 'don dang ldan pa'i mu tig gi mdzod rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che dang / spos dang / tsan dan thams cad kyi byem rgya mtsho sprin dang / rin po chethams
215a2(rgyud): ci gdugs rgyam smin rnams dang / no bu'i rgyal po med du la de rdzog sa yangs pa'i dbyasatsholdan rnam pa dang / nyim mdza gyin 'i tshogs kyi phreng rgyam ma smin rnamapa dang / rin po che'i mdzod

256b3(rgyud): bcu las mtho nges grub// las 'di dge ba dang por rab sbyangs pas// gong nas gong mi'i sa la rab gnas kyang // dge ba bcu yi rtags ni dman pa'i zhing 'dir bstan// gdu
256b4(rgyud): pa'ing tshul can gyis 'gro ba 'dren mdzad mA// bskyod par 'os pa khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// de nas dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo la gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos sras kyis lam rnam pa
256b5(rgyud): lnga'i tshul gyis bstod pa// dam pa rnams kyis bgrod pa'i khyad par ni// tshogs kyis spangs nas don dam mthong bya yi// gnyen po ye shes rim par sgom pa la// mthar phyin pa la gshes
256b6(rgyud): ba'i don mchog lags// de bas lha mo khyod kyi mtshan nyid ni// 'di ltar rang ldan khyod kyi khyad par te// dang po'i tshogs las yang dkar bA bsags pas// dang pos las sbyor ba'i ting
256b7(rgyud): brnyes// rab tu dga' ba'i skal don dman// rnam par mi rtog sde med tshul gyis gzigs// dpal ldan byang chub sems dpa'i khyad par ni// rang sems sa gnyis dag la rol brten nas/ 
256b8(rgyud): / de bzhin sa gsum dag pa'i pha rol son// rang sems bzhi pa'i sa la cher bsgoms pas// lnga pa'i sal bsam gtan pha rol son// rang sems drug pa'i sa la cher sbyangs pa
257a1(rgyud): bdun pa la ni thabs kyi pha rol son// rang sems brgyad pa nyid la char bsgoms pas// dpal ldan lha mo nag mo smon lam nyid// dgu pa la yang stobs kyi yon
257a2(rgyud): sgrub// de yi stobs kyi ye shes 'phen par 'grub// 'di dag rnam par rdzogs par byas nas ni// sangs rgyas sa la smin pa'i smon lam can// sa brgyad non pas gzhon nu'i tshul 'cha
257a3(rgyud): mo// 'gro ba 'dul phyir drag po'i tshul ston cing // gdug pa 'dul mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag kyang khyod kyi lam ltar myur 'gru ba shog/ de nas ma bla pa ci'i rgyab po sngon
257a4(rgyud): mgo can gyis dang la lha mo nog mo chen mo la gnyis su med pa'i sgo nas bstod pa// dpal ldan lha mo gnyis su med pa ste// don dam sbas bral chos nyid 'di lngas bsngal// de na dam
257a5(rgyud): kun rdzob gnyis su med pa bden// 'khor ba myang 'das gnyis su med pas zab// sems can sangs rgyas gnyis su med pas 'phags// las dang rnam smin gnyis su med pas
257a6(rgyud): bstod// rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis su med pas smin// yul dang yul can gnyis med gcig gi dang // spos dang spros med don dam dbyings kyis bsdus// bsod nams ye shes
257a7(rgyud): gnyis med chags chen te// mthong dang dam pa gnyis med dag pas bstod// bdag dang gzhan gyi chos ni ngang tshul gcig/ gzung dang 'dzin pa gnyis med zab mo'i mthu// mtho ras
257a8(rgyud): ngan song gnyis bral dag pa'i zhing // bzang ngan gnyis med rang na gcig gas bstod// bskyed med rdzogs pa gnyis med lhun grub mchog/ sems dang phung po gnyis med sems
257b1(rgyud): nyid de// sku ba dang bslab bya gnyis med grub pa'i dang // bdag gzhan gnyis med tshul mchog gcig gis bskyod// ya hA dang yum mkha' gnyis med byang chub sems// thabs dang shes
257b2(rgyud): A kanyis su med pa 'dren// stong dang mi stong gnyis med ni ba'i dang // gyur dang 'thur med rtsol bral phyag 'tshal bstod// sgra tshig gnyis med brjod pa med pa'i nga // lus ngag gnyis ldad
257b3(rgyud): rtsol byed rtso la bya gnyis med don gcig pas// rnam par spros med don dmo dbyings kyis bstod// mu stegs sangs rgyas gnyis sbed tshul gcig pas// dbyings
257b4(rgyud): ye shes gnyis med don rtogs te// srid dang rnam grol yang dag don gcig pas// thams cad gnyis med sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// byi dang nang med gnyis med gcig gis dang // semra
257b5(rgyud): ldan sems snyed rnam dag ni pa'i tshul// snang dang mi swA ga nyis mad gcig gis mthod// gnyis med don mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'ded// rnams ni don dam thab mo'i tshul
257b6(rgyud): smol pa med pa'i don dang 'brel ba ste// 'diran pas lha mo khyod kyi thugs lpags la// 'di ltar bstod pas bdag ljang khyod ltar shog/ de'i tshe de'i dus ni dri ba'i rgyal po zung bud lnga pas dpal lha
257b7(rgyud): byol phrin las kyi sgonas bstod pa// sems nyid drin+da lAs rnam pa bzhi yi khyad par ni// sems nyi dgud dmemad cing sems kyang med// don dam smos brel kha dog gzugs kyad myed// kun
257b8(rgyud): grosu metsem du rang gi sems// 'thun par 'gyu po'i zhi ba dpal lha mo// zhi mdzad ni 'gyur zhib 'angang tshul can// zhi ba'i 'khor gyis bskor ba'i gtso mon// rtags kyi sku mdog dag
258a1(rgyud): // shin du dang // kun du ni mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bsod// bdag gi dgra dang nad rnams ni bar mdzod// thun par bstan pa'i rgyas pa'i dpal rdza 'o// rgyas mdzad rgyas 'gyur
258a2(rgyud): da'i nga tshul can// rgyas pa'i 'a khor gyis bskor ba'i gcomano// rtags kyi sku mdog ser mo shin tu dzad// kun du rgyas mdzad ma la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag gi bso nams
258a3(rgyud): da// 'thun par bstan pa'i dbang mo dpal lha mo// dbang mdzad dbang sgyur dbang gi ngang tshul can// dbang gi 'khor gyis bskor ba'i gtso mo ni// rtags kyi sku mdo
258a4(rgyud): dmar mo shin du brjid// kun du dbang mdzad khyod la phyag 'tsha lnga bstod// bdag gi nad dang dgra rnams dbang du mdzad// 'thun par bstan pa'i drag mo dpal lha mo// drag mdzadadu
258a5(rgyud): tur drag mo'i ngang tshul can// drag mo'i 'khor gyis bskor ba'i ga/ chags kyis mdog dayo shin tu brjed// kun du drag mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag gi nad
258a6(rgyud): dkA rnams drag mos sod// khyod kyi rang bzhin cing yang mad nyid cing yang snang ba ni// byin las rnam bzhes 'gro don mdzad pa lags// bdag kyang las ban
258a7(rgyud): bzhin lhun grub nas// khyod ltar gzhan gyi dron la brtson par shag/ de nas dpal lha monag mo li kA'i rgyal po dga' bos sku'i yon tan gyi sgonas bstod pa// gsang sngags rnal la
258a8(rgyud): grub pa'i bdag nyid ma// yon tan rnams kyi sku mdog phyag mtshan ni// don du snang ba med kyang gdul bya'i phyir// rtags kyi phyag rgya 'di ltar bstan pa'o// 
258b1(rgyud): bong bu zhon// mya ngan me 'da'i rtags su lcags sgrog mda'// bdag don lhun grub glang chen ko bAs brgyan// gzhan don phun sum tshogs phyir re ldes dkris// byang chub sems
258b2(rgyud): zla rgyas gsal// shes rab rtogs phyir lte ba nyi mas brgyan// dug gsum stong po gcod pa'i ral gri dang // bsod nams gter gyi phyag mtshan ne'u la bsnams// dbang drag
258b3(rgyud): phyir ral pa kham nag sdug/ nyon mongs 'dren phyir no dpal mche ba gtsigs// 'khor ba ljags la bdar phyir rkan sgra brdab// gdug pa rgol gnon phyir sdang mig bgrad// thams
258b4(rgyud): dbang du bsdud phyir spyan rtsi dmar// snyoms pa'i tshogs mchog mi 'gyur sku mdog gnas/ me mo 'dul phyir dur khrod rkyen gyis brgyan+da// sku gsung thugs ldan rtags kyi phyag rgya
258b5(rgyud): sor// skye gsum rdzogs byed thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan// drag po myur mgyogs bstan phyir chub mas brgyan// nyon mongs sreg phyir mo phreng nang na 'azhugs// 'dod khams bskyed
258b6(rgyud): yongs 'du'i shing la brtan// lha min 'dul byer rdzong gi dka' bzlog ma// dpa' brtan bstan phyir stag gi sham thabs bsnams// bstan pa bsrung phyir drag mo'i cha lugs rdzogs// 
258b7(rgyud): nga rgyal dbang bsdad bdag med sgra sgrogs phyir// thabs kyi snyan tshwa g.yas pa seng ges brgyan// zhe sdang dbang 'dul dug che dri 'dul ba'i phyir// shes rab snyan cha g.yon pa sprul
258b8(rgyud): brtson// 'du byed mertag rtags su dril bu sgrogs// chags phyir rngam sadza dngag ta'i 'akrong chung // de mtshiga'i srung phyir zhing rdzogs rkyen du mdzad// thad da las rnas sa 'dul gyi/ 
259a1(rgyud): bya'i 'bru// nyon mongs sgrib pa'i tshogs rnams rab sbyangs nas// ye shes rig pa'i tshogs rnams shar ba'i byer// rang bzhin gnas mchog byang shar 'cham pan/ 
259a2(rgyud): // da ma sa sa gnas kyi bre man// nyon ma mas sa m+b+hir mu la rdul rnam groms kya sa/ ma //  sa ma rnam po la/ 
259a3(rgyud): mgo dgu pas dpal lha mo la sgo gsung thugs kyi sgo nas bstod pa// don dam gnyis med byang chub sems yin yang // srid gsum gdul phyir rtags kyi phyag rgya ni// 
259a4(rgyud): rnam dag drag po'o gzhal yas khang // ra ka ta khrag gi rgya mtsho 'khyil pa las// keng rus thod phreng ning gi pags pas brgyan// sku mdog gnag la rab 'jigs khro mo rgyal
259a5(rgyud): sngon mo lnga pa 'dzings ma'i sprul pa 'gyed// sku yi sprul pa dpal ldan re ma 'dzu// gru gsum ser na gzhal gyi dbyings su bzhengs// yon tan rgyas mdzad ser mo mkha' la
259a6(rgyud): bzhed// phrin las rgyas pa thams cad nye bar mdzod// gsung gi sprul pa dpal ldan rim hi// gru gsum dmar na gzhal gyi dbyings nas bablangs// dmar mtshan mo dam
259a7(rgyud): gtum ma ste// dbang gi phrin las thams cad grub par mdzod// sku gsung thugs ldan sprul pa rgya mtshom// drag po 'joms mdzod bdud dpung zil gyis gnon// 'gro drug sgrol mdzad
259a8(rgyud): sems can kun gyim// bsun pargyas mdzad ma la phyag 'tshal baspyod// bdag gi lus ngag ya dgasum byin gyis rlobs// de nas dang la lha mol lha ma yin ci rgyal po cag zangs
259b1(rgyud): dris kyis don dam pa'i sgo nas bstod pa/ spros bral 'o dgasal yang dag shi ba'i ngang // thugs kyi thugs mchog rnam dag bden pa'i yum// gdod nas gnyis med nam mkha'i snying
259b2(rgyud): ni// dpal ldan khyod kyi rang bzhin spyad pa gsal// 'di ltar rnam dag 'arjod pa 'o la// khyis pa rnams kyis bskyed pa byed pa lhung // sman pa rnams kyis dngos por bA btug+sa
259b3(rgyud): gzugs can tshul du grang zhig bstod pa'i tshig/ rgyal ba'i don spangs thugs chud khyod nyid la// tshig dang yi ge'i sgo nas bstod pa rnams// nam yang grol bar 'gyur ba'i chos kyi
259b4(rgyud): min// gdod nas gnyis med pade chen ma rtogs par// khyod kyi skyon lam rtags kyi cho 'phrul la// don du bzung nas gang zhig bstod pa rnams// khyod la brten nas thams cad ltung
259b5(rgyud): 'gyur// gang zhig skye ba med par shes pa dang // gdod nas gnyis yod snying po bsgoms nus na// gang zag des ni khyod nyid bstod pa yin// khyod kyi gzugs dang kha dog 'dzin pa
259b6(rgyud): bskal ba grangs mdo 'das par rab bltas kyang // khyod kyi gzugs dang kha dog mthong mi rus// gang zhig gzugs su mi 'dzidan rnams kyi mthong // sgra dang tshig dang brjod pa thams cad
259b7(rgyud): khyod ni bos kyang bskalnga bar mi thos te// 'di dag spangs pa'i rnal 'byor de yis ni// khyod kyang thos la de yang khyod kyis thos// gang zhig lus ngag dge bas khyod bsgrub pa'i// blun po
259b8(rgyud): i.a nam yang khyod nyid spangs// lus ngag spangs pa'i sems kyis khyed mchod nas// mchod na dngos grub de yis ster thob 'gyur// khyod ni rgyal ba mang por yon han bsdud/ 
260a1(rgyud): kyi dbyings na rgyal ba rnams dang mjas// bar myod bu ma'i rang bzhin ston pa'i phyir// mi mjed 'jig rten shin du rtsub pa 'dir// phyi rol tshul gyis thams cad
260a2(rgyud): ma// khyod kyis ni 'di ltar rab brtags pa// sgrib pa mang po stong nyid nga du gshegs// stong nyid dam pa spyod pa yang dag spyod// skyong pag gis med shes pa rnams kyis 'bru
260a3(rgyud): lhur bstod na bskyed par 'gyur grang bas// khyod ni bstod pa'i yul can ma yin yang // byis pa drang phyir don lnga 'di ltar bstod// de nas nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po rdo rje gser
260a4(rgyud): kyis dpal lha mo pa bskyed pa/ dpal ldan lha mad sdig ba dga'ab 'don// thabs kyi tsho bathul rnam mkha'i la s+ho//  rgyub sems dpa'i skal ba stod nyid pa// nos
260a5(rgyud): rdul snyed dbyangs kyis phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag gis khyod ni mchod pas ma bsgribs kyang // dpal ldan dngos grub mA pa thob bya'i phyir// 'dod pa'i yon tan mkha'
260a6(rgyud): pas// mchod pa'i cho gas 'dis dbang po rgyal gyur cig/ dpal ldan khyod ni dge sdig bdag po ste// bdeg gi lus ngag yid kyi sdig pa'i tshogs// khyod kyi thad du 'khyod pas
260a7(rgyud): bshags na// thugs rje'i shugs kyis sgrib pa byang bar mdzod// khyod kyi khyad par yongs su 'phags pa ni// 'gro ba'i don mdzad bdag don phun sum tshogs// dga' 'phru
260a8(rgyud): dog med pa'i spros pa ni// rjes su yi rang khyod kyi rgyud la 'bul// 'di ltar yon tan ldan pa'i sku mchog ni// nag mo bzang po 'jigs pa'i mthu stobs kyis// phyogs bcu du
260b1(rgyud): dadu bkod la// su 'phrul dra ba'i tshul gyis bskul bar spobs// yang dag khyod kyi yon dasu mchog de// gdug pa 'dul zhing bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir// sems can zang bar ma
260b2(rgyud): // mya ngan mi 'da' bzhugs par gsol ba gdab// 'di ltar phyag 'tshal mchod nas bshegs pa dang // rjes su yi rang bskul ning gsol btab nas// dge ba'ang yis nganas
260b3(rgyud): gyur te// thams cad tshigs rdzogs byang chub chen por bsngo// de nas dpal lha mo nag mo la// nam mkha' ldi bran rnams kyi sgribastod pa// bskal pa me ltar 'byur ba'i klong
260b4(rgyud): ga dku pa'i klong 'khyil po brang nas// ma smig 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang blag ma// bdud kyi yum la ga shin rje'i lam cag ma// dpal ldan lha mo gsor ma te// neg po
260b5(rgyud): pa mchob can// mthe nag gcer ruklag gi ral btsun// khyod kyis mdog nag mor btsugs pa ni// don dam dpyongs kyis bsod pa medade pa'i chags// dbus
260b6(rgyud): dmyal ba ni// yum rdzi mkha' la sprul pa 'gyed ba'i nags// dbu gtsug ral pa gcig tu 'al ng+ge// don dam dgongs spyod ga mye du mdzad pa'achags// ral pa'i
260b7(rgyud): samasag 'gro ba ni// gas kyi sulnga pa phyogs bcu 'byed pa chags// dbul thod dod phreng ba 'acings pa ni// thugs rjes sbal skyes 'gro don mdzad pa'i rtags// rna ba g.yas
260b8(rgyud): mchong pa ni// sman ma thams cad zil gyis gnon po'i rtags// yon /  mtho gdengs ka' phyar ba ni// zhe sdang ma spangs dbyings su dag pa'i rtags/ snyan chags
261a1(rgyud): bu 'khrol ba ni// sangs nas kun la bsnyen sa 'byed pa rtags// sman rtsa dmar la sdang mig 'grod pa ni// sred gsum rnal 'byor dam sdig byar byed// zhal kye drag
261a2(rgyud): pa ho ma 'du ga dngas pa ni// bstan pa 'ag pa nga thA skul ba'i rtogs// rno gdug sna rgya ba zu dgas bA ga sa // bsgral shing 'anas lce stsol ba ga// sprul zhing
261a3(rgyud): kayang gzhi gsol ba ni// yang dag chos dang don dang ldan pa'i rtags// glang chen ko rlon snam byed dkris pa ri// theg pa mchog gi don dang ldan pa'i rtags// re lden
261a4(rgyud): ba dri// 'jig rten 'di na che bcon ldan pa'i rtags// lci ba'i khung nas nyi ma 'char ba ni// sdig bsngal rgya mtsho gting nas skems pa'i rtags// spyi bo gtsug nas zla ba'ichar ba ni/ 
261a5(rgyud): ma rig mun ba sel ba'i rtags// nebs la dbang gi lcags sgrog 'khyil pa ni// thabs dang shes rab klung du 'brel ba'i rtags// phyag g.yas shang lang dag po bsnams pa na// 
261a6(rgyud): bsngal skye shi rlud nas gcod pa'i dgras// phyag g.yon thod rlon dmar chen 'thung ba ni// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal khrag ltar 'thung ba'i rtags// bong bug pa phyin phyogs ni
261a7(rgyud): log bA ro lta ba'i sems can sgrol ba'i rtags// srin po'i khag mas snga ru byas pa ni// srin yul lang kaM pur 'dul ba'i rtags// sbrul nag chun pos gong rmed byas pa ni// zhe sdang
261a8(rgyud): dbang gis 'gegs rigs 'joms pa'i rtags// duswa ba nag po'i phog bu btang ba na// klu bdud nag bid ma la btags pa'i rtags// snga sha g.yas pa bdud kyi khram pas
261b1(rgyud): dam tshig nyams pa kram la 'dabs pa'i rtags// phyi shar nad kyi rgyal pa btags pa ni// bstan pa 'di la gnod pa'i dgra bol// nad ka 'a bebs shing da la kha bskur ba'i rtags// 
261b2(rgyud): dam bcud 'i rtags su dag gle bor nges btang // thugs rje chags pa'i rtags su ka ta'i thig ldes brgyan// 'dul byed phrin las rtags su thal ba'i mtshan mA sa btag// 
261b3(rgyud): bus phrag bran du 'khol ba ni// khams gsum khyab par phrin las mdzad pa'i rtags// ma cig kha nas me 'byor rgya mtsho skems// lag na rdo rje 'phyar bas ri rab tshogs
261b4(rgyud): bdag gis brtson par lha mo khyod la bskyod// de nas yang gshin rje nag pos dpal lha mo ba yon tan gyi sgon po bstod pa// lha mo dpal ldan mkha' 'gro nag mo khyod la ni/ 
261b5(rgyud): rgyun du til mar gyis byugs len bu gcig pa ste// ro nyan chas bsgyings shing b.lugs bang po'am bang ma// rgyan tu rkang smug lcags la byas pa gcig gis rkang la mdzes par
261b6(rgyud): na pa ste// ma hA na ma bong bu zhon nas 'gro ba don nag mo khyod nyid yin par shes// ral pas bdag nyid mdzes par brgyan te khyod kyi spyod pa mtsho chen don dag su yis shes// 'a
261b7(rgyud): 'a'ajig pa'i tshan mi rus dgal khrag dang zhage 'dzag dub 'phrul ba na// nag mo mcheb mi bzad khyod kyi zhal du 'gro kun skad cig tsam du zhugs par 'gyur// lha mo lcagan mithong
261b8(rgyud): pa khyod ni rnal 'byor grub pa'i rnal 'byor can du dur khrid dgyes// khyod ni g.yog bcas mya ngan med cing 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa med par dril bu'i sgra yang sgrogs// khyod ni dpa' bo dang
262a1(rgyud): // gi mA go bcud g.yul du mtshon gyis bsang ba'i mgo phreng ldag na thogs shing gar stabs bskor zhing lag sa brgya bkram che// nub chos tshul klu dbang ban
262a2(rgyud): thig ler brgyan// mi yi shal so sor che mche me za yin mi ro dag gcod pan mazhol brgyan pa ste// bdag la slob pa'i drag mo mi sha thogs pa khyod ni snga nas ma mthong ga
262a3(rgyud): mthong na// bdud dang srin mo mu mo rnams kyang mig rtsa rig rig dngang zhing khyod la 'dud// lha mo bzang mo lus medog gnag cing bzod par dka' ba khyod la brgya byin la sang
262a4(rgyud): bas// bstod pa byed pa'i gshin rje'i rgyal po nyid kyang rtag tu 'dud// lha rnams dang ni 'grib ma lus mjug brtul bas na rna ba la TIg la// brang gis 'gro ba sgrol mgo
262a5(rgyud): gadrengs ka stong dang ldan zhing gcig gis rgyab nas rgyan du byasak+ShayA cig la ni seng ge mtshungs med thogs shing rgya mtsho bskor zhing sa gzhag non pa sA steng gi/ phyogs nas rgyu
262a6(rgyud): ba'i nyi ma zlab lha mo khyod kyi lce nas 'char zhing srad gsum zil gyis gdon kargya mtsho klong nas me 'bar chu rnams skems par byed par nus pa
262b1(rgyud): dzad ma// lha chen skra dang 'tsham par bzhugs pa'i dka' bzlog nag mo mi nad phyugs nang kun la 'jigs pa med// ma gcig khyod nyid la ni bdag ni gug par phyag 'tshal
262b2(rgyud): cing bstod par ba gyi// de nas dpal lha mo nag mo la bram ze mchog sred kyis na rdzob kyi bden pa brten par bstod pa// maHla mo pal lha mo// rdo rje lha mon gam
262b3(rgyud): mthu che na~M kyod pa phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag gis btsun par khyod bstod kyis// bkri shis mchog grub sems gter gnas// yi dmyur gzugs chen kun du grags// 
262b4(rgyud): grags shing 'jig rten skyong // dpa' brtul drag spyod brtson 'grus tsho// 'thab mo g.yul las rtag tu rgyal// gshin rdo'i sring mo yin par bstod// gos su dang gos snga
262b5(rgyud): ga sol// sdug dang mi ldog cha lugs 'chang // skyon mig mthong na mi sdug kun du sngangs// dad cing chog pa'i mi rnams bsdud// res 'ga' ri brag rab mor gnas// res 'ga'
262b6(rgyud): chal drang shing la gnas// rjes 'ga' dur khrod dbus na gnas// lha mo'i gnas rten de du 'char// srinas de ri dang tshal dgo du// rtag tu lha me khyod bstod na// de yis pa
262b7(rgyud): bskongs par byed// bdag gis rtag tu bstod byas na// bdag gi bsam pa grub par mdzod// rma bya'i sgrol rgyul mtshan byas// gang zhig rtog bsnyen bsrung bar byed// gnag
262b8(rgyud): lug phyugs rnams 'phel bar byed// seng ge stag dang spyang ka yas// rtag tu kun nas bskor nas kyang // rdo rje dril chen sman pa
263a1(rgyud): // lan 'ga' la glan tra shul thogs// lan 'ga' nyi zla'i ru mtshon phyar// mar gyi tshes dgu bcu gcig na// de yi dus su mchod byas na// lha mo khyod las lhag pa
263a2(rgyud): med// bdud 'dul lha min srin mor ston// dgra dang 'thab tshe rgyal bar byed// bud med nang na mchog yin to// tshig dbang 'jig rten mgon po 'dra// rgyal po khab na pad+ma 'dra// 
263a3(rgyud): kyeganyen shes 'dra// lha dang lha min g.yul 'byed che// lha mo khyod kyi lte ba lo// lha rnams kun gyi rdzo
263a4(rgyud): nas// lha dmag dkar po rgyal bar byas// lha ma yin rnams pham par byed// lag na mdung dmar rje mas se tshems// ru mtshon pa dan me ltar 'bar// dag 'dul g.yul bzlog
263a5(rgyud): de la bstod// de nas drang srong chen po ko ru da~M n+yas dpal lha mol dpe byed kyi sgo nas bstod pa// 'jig rten gcol rtag tu gus phyag 'tshal// ma rnams nang na khyod na rtag tu mchog
263a6(rgyud): yin te// 'jig rten gsum po thams cad khyod la bstod// byad bzhin sdug mdzes kun gyis blta bar mos// yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs lus rab brgyan// mig yangs 'ang
263a7(rgyud): skyes sngon po'i 'dab ma 'dra// bsod nams ye shes snang ba grags pas brgyan// dper na ring zad mang ba'i nor bu 'dra// deng bdag bde mo khyod la brtags pas kyang // sems la
263a8(rgyud): bobasam pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// yang dag ye shes kyi nom bkra shis pa// pad ma lta 'ur shin du rnam par dag/ kub mdog rab mdzes kun gyis blta bar mos// mtshan
263b1(rgyud): yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs brgyan// dri med ye shes rab mdzes pa// dran pa rnams kyin pa dmachog tu chung // ci snang se geg man zan mchog gyur bzhin// bsngags bstod jig ni
263b2(rgyud): las 'byung yis// bsam pa'i dngos po rnams ca grub pa sho// ces bstod do// de na skad dul phyi/  rdo rjes 'dus pa rnams la bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis dpa' le lo la

263b4(rgyud): yin no// lha mo ngas kyang mi 'di bsrung bar byed do// skyob par byed do// ci 'dod pa'i dngos grub steng ngo zhes bka' stsal pa dang / 'arjod de rnams rab tu dga' nas bcom ldan 'das bya/

264a3(rgyud): ba'i// rgyu 'bras rkyen gyi bdag nyid can// 'gro la phan mdzad mkhas pa'i mchog/ dpal ldan lha mo nag mo 'phags// byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa ste// sa ltar brten pa'i
264a4(rgyud): gyur pa// yon tAn sdud byed chu dang 'dra// byang chub smin byed me lta bu// dge ba'i 'du byed rlung ltar g.yo// shes rab nam dag nam mkha' ste// khyod ni 'byung ba chen po 'dra//

264a6(rgyud): 'gro// khyod ni bum pa ba'ang lta bu// dper na yid bzhin nor bu'i chu// kun la phan pa'i dpag bsdam shing // nyi ma 'dra bar khyod la gsal// zla ltar gsal ba'i thugs mnga'

264b1(rgyud): rnams kyi lam du 'gro// lha mo ma mo gnod sbyin mo// srin mo klu mo sha ba mo// gdug mo 'byung mgrul bram mo// drag mo rngam tshul glog 'gra ma// rlung mo nag mo 'jigs byed ma//

293a2(rgyud): skrag pa rA 98// shes rab stobs kyis sbyangs rgyas yang dag 'phags// mi skye srung gi shes rab stobs rtogs nas// snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pan// shes ra
293a3(rgyud): bas kyi sgra ni grag par 'gyur// oM na mo b+ha ga wa te A pa ri me ta a yur dz+nyA na su bi mi sh+tsi ta to dza rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya a ra ha te sa myaka saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+yathA/ oM sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud
293a4(rgyud): pra te ga gnas mud ga te swa b+hA lA pa~M shud d+hi ma hA nA ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'i stsal nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / thams cad dang

293a6(rgyud): ye shes dpag tu me dpa'i ga zungs rdzogs s+ho// // rgyu gar skad du/ A byas pa ri mi ta ya yud dz+nyA ni hr-i da ya nA ma d+hA ra tri/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa che dang ye shes dpa

293a8(rgyud): tas bskor ba'i rdzing bu'i 'gram na/ dge slong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dum chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas
293b1(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'di nas nub

293b3(rgyud): gyur// 'chi ba'i dus su ston pa ni// dge slong dge 'dun bcas te mthong // de na bu med yod ma yin// mngal na gnas pa yod mA yin// rin chen rnams kyi pad+mo las// rdzu 'phrul chen po

293b8(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyi yab ni 'a khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzang po'i mchog ces bya bar gyur to// de'i yum ni gzi brjid can zhes bya bar gyur to// de'i btsun mo rgyal
294a1(rgyud): rigs bzang srung ma 'as bya bar gyur to// dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi sras ni zla ba'i 'od ces bya bar gyur to// rim gro pa ni snyan pa dri ma ma
294a2(rgyud): bar gyur to// dge slong dog de bzhin gshegs pa ched dpag med kyi shes rab can gyi mchog tu gyur pa ni babang po'i tog ces bya bar gyur to// rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i mchog drang

299a6(rgyud): sdang dul zhing 'jigs med dang // bza' rnams bkur cing rigs btsun 'thob// dug dang 'dre ga shin gdon bral dang // lus la dri zhem kun dga' dang // bsam ngan

321b8(rgyud): // de dag mo sa sbya ba 'ig/ g.yu ning dmus med dag par byed// ma na
322a1(rgyud): 'a ga la pa / rang na gnyims pags pa yang // dbus gang ba gachag pa// yangs pa na ga du stan ngas gzigs dbangag

328a1(rgyud): rje ste// lcags kyus 'jig rten skyong bas pasrung // rin chen be'u 'bu ste bde bgyur// khre su gang mur byed par 'gyur// bgrang phreng gis na lung bstan 'thob// khri rkang
328a2(rgyud): nye dbang 'gyur// khri sogs bdug bdud yin to// mdud rjegasum pas gzul las rgal// bdad mar bas ltar s+ya// ri la ba ste thugs tshangs rIs sku// sprin mdon ldan drang srong bya/ 
328a3(rgyud): zhal masod// pad+ma rAgs ye nas skye// padrasan pas dge'a'i byed// bad+ma dkar pas dge tshogs 'phel// ri bom bu dang bu mo 'ape 'o// d+ma gra sas bdud kyi bar chad sel// 'khor dang sems 'thunam
328a4(rgyud): kA ras// thub kyis dgra dang gcan ga ni 'dza mi swe// nga yab dkar pos sdig pa 'phyag me tog skyes pa nad sel byed// rin chen mdangs ni yid 'ang grogs// gzhus na nor dang go 'phang rnyed// chu shal du
328a5(rgyud): tshad ribs sal// mi 'jigs phyag gis 'jigs sdug 'dosas// dgral dag tun shing ste// rjenag pa 'dud 'dul 'gyur// rid chen pal gres rig sngags pac+doMn/ phan las ltung ba dang / 
328a6(rgyud): yen pa la byed nags /  pa / ra kya da rdzug/ ya na na da / sa pa las de mig na
328a7(rgyud): dod na// sangs rgyas lnga po dmigs par bya// de nas ma gan po spyan rapa gzigs// 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis pad+ma na ku/ sa yi snying po lnga gzigs nas// sA ri ko rim 'ad gsungs so// 
328a8(rgyud): rin pa'i rtog pa ni// gsang sngags thams cad sa bdun te// gsang sngags dang sngags sbyar sa// rag 'changs dang rig gas las// rig mchogs dang 'i phyag rgya chen po 'a
328b1(rgyud): go/ gtsug tor chen po sangs rgyas pa// gnas dbas drug tu rgyal bas gsungs// kun tu 'od dang bad+ma'i spun// yig 'khor lo tshags chen sa/ der 'chang la shas bla ma'i sa// rdzogs sangs bde bcan
328b2(rgyud): sa/ pa'i phreng pos gsol pa/ mgon pa bags pa sa rje'i spyan ras gshegs dbang gyu// byin rnaM swA gsag ga rdus 'amar ba'i bcan gas phyugs 'gram tha gdangs la dgal
328b3(rgyud): slong gis// byang chub rin chen sa la 'jog mdzad ngo mtshar che// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po padra dra ba zhes bya ba las byin brlab 'byung ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// 
328b4(rgyud): de nas tshungs pa'i 'jig rten du// rab dga'i tshul du 'khrungs pa'i lha// ting 'dzin yangs pa zhes bya ba// rtogs pa rgya che zab bzhig/ 'dzar dang bcas pa bzhengs byas te// me tog rid che ni drags
328b5(rgyud): zhi pa'i phyogs su char bzhin pa ba// mkha' la gdugs kyu bla re ba kang // 'khor dang bcas pas mgrin gcig tu// gsang bstod nas ni tshi nyide gsapa// lag na rdo rje rnga rnga chang // rdo rje theg pa bla med pa'o/ 
328b6(rgyud): rig 'dzin mchog grub pa// rdo rje rnal 'byor las byung phyir/ bdag dang sems can kun tu yang // dngos grub 'byung rim bshad du gsol// la la sems ni g.yengs pa yis// bla ma'i rgyud don bral mod
328b7(rgyud): kyang // sngags rgyud sdig pa 'chang byed 'byung // snyan tshig rmongs rnams ngo mtshar swa// gdams ngag med po'i 'gro ba pasku// dngos grub med pas bstan pa gzhag/ sred pas ldan gtsigasal par
328b8(rgyud): 'gyur// gnyis pa dkyil tshogs ngan 'gror 'gro/ la la las kyi skye mched sgo// dbang po tan/ 'damar myur la// gdams dge chung tshul zod mod kyi// chos tshul bzhin du spyod byed cing // gang la dbang du
329a1(rgyud): pa ye// bu 'dra bas kyang brnyas gyur nas// sdang ba 'phel nas cod par 'gyur// des kyang gnyis kar dmyal sogs 'gro// la la thos chung shes rab dman// mongs pa gzhan
329a2(rgyud): ngargyal can// bstan pa dang ni 'chang byed la// skyon smod smra ba'i dmyal sogs 'gro// la la mi dge'i bshes gnyen gyis// la rgo la ma 'jug pa'i nges 'dzin tsam// yang dag la ma smod brtson pa
329a3(rgyud): la la 'dod sred ga tu marde ba che// mkhas gzhan drag pa phrag dog gis// sgo skar tshul 'chos chos la spyod// rang nyid lta ngan bsgrub la rtsod// zer zug blo yi phun pa can// 'byung po drug po'i rigs
329a4(rgyud): la la ser sna rab 'jug pas// lha dang bla ma tshig gis bstod// bas dang longs spyod rgyan gos dang // ma tog 'dug phras gtor mo sogs// nyud du zug tshul rgyun stsal na// zas sko bdag gis
329a5(rgyud): payi// li dwags dben pa'i rags su ni// yang nas yang du skye bar nges// de phyir de dag spangs nas ni// ra rabs pasam pa bzang ldan pas// tshul bzhin blangs te thos bsam gyis// gtan la ba 'ad
329a6(rgyud): 'khrul bar// brjod cing yid la byed pa dang // the tshom med par brtson byed pas// 'gro tshogs sgrol byed tha'as thoban// rang don 'ba' zhig smos ci dgos// de nas la gan rdo dzag go// ye shes ma
329a7(rgyud): mnga' ba'i spug// 'gro la snying brtser ngas gzigs nas// gsang ba'i skad kyis 'di skad gsung gang mnyan par brtson byed pa// shin tu legs ma lha le bu// lha dang dang ma grub 'byung 'brel
329b1(rgyud): dzin pa 'is pagang byar / khyo byed ci ga ya kyis ni// legs par can pa med la chub / shin cupa skyed la/ dbardus dpa pa shin // rgyun cad ma pa zugs na// 
329b2(rgyud): gzigs dbang mgon po gtso// rang gi sems la bskyed par bya// shin tu gas pa na dngos grub 'gyur// dang pa skyed pa'i byang chub sems// gnyis pa yi ge
329b3(rgyud): tshogs sems// bge ba gzugs brnyan phyag rgya'i sems// lnga ba byin brlab rgyas 'debs sems// sgra dang brag cha'i chu ba 'byung bar// gca pa 'khor gyis khyad par gsol// dbus su yi gri oM wa

331a1(rgyud): tshogs med yid da gra ba dbang phyug// do byug tu gter skom can// kun kyang pad+ma zlabala'o//  ni rin chen dbang phyug ste// zlab chen dbang phyug dang bras nus// sgrub pa

334a1(rgyud): mthar bsran na mes tshigasos// srin bu ring mo skyo la ga/ tadakar gcen la khyor gang 'thung // des ni srog chags bud par 'gyur// 'bras la ras kyi lo ma yis// 'ab bsko
334a2(rgyud): bas byug par bya// bod ba'i rtag pags rababatso // la gAr mig thugs na soso// mtshanas sbyangs las dkar ro// de gAnyi kAts+tsha gcig bzlas// brgya rtsa brgyad brjod shu gad/ 
334a3(rgyud): dpung bar btags pas g.yul las rgyal// phug ron ril mnye shu brgyad// bzlas bcas bsdus pas ldag smrig dang // shing smrig la sogs grol bar nges// thal ba'am bye ma la ni sngags
